GV05brup___u:1: sūryaś cakṣur vātaḥ prāṇo vyāttam agnir vaiśvānaraḥ saṃvatsara ātmāśvasya medhyasya /
GV05brup___u:2: dyauḥ pṛṣṭham antarikṣam udaraṃ pṛthivī pājasyaṃ diśaḥ pārśve avāntaradiśaḥ parśava
GV05brup___u:3: ṛtavo 'ṅgāni māsāś cārdhamāsāś ca parvāṇy ahorātrāṇi pratiṣṭhā nakṣatrāṇy asthīni nabho māṃsāni /
GV05brup___u:4: ūvadhyaṃ sikatāḥ sindhavo gudā yakṛc ca klomānaś ca parvatā oṣadhayaś ca vanaspatayaś ca lomāni /
GV05brup___u:14: etau vā aśvaṃ mahimānāv abhitaḥ sambabhūvatuḥ /
GV05brup___u:15: hayo bhūtvā devān avahad vājī gandharvān arvāsurān aśvo manuṣyān /
GV05brup___u:16: samudra evāsya bandhuḥ samudro yoniḥ // BrhUp_1,1.2 //
GV05brup___u:23: arcate vai me kam abhūd iti /
GV05brup___u:25: kaṃ ha vā asmai bhavati ya evam etad arkyasyārkatvaṃ veda // BrhUp_1,2.1 //
GV05brup___u:27: tad yad apāṃ śara āsīt tat samahanyata /
GV05brup___u:30: tasya śrāntasya taptasya tejoraso niravartatāgniḥ // BrhUp_1,2.2 //
GV05brup___u:31: sa tredhātmānaṃ vyakurutādityaṃ tṛtīyaṃ vāyuṃ tṛtīyam /
GV05brup___u:33: tasya prācī dik śiro 'sau cāsau cermau /
GV05brup___u:34: athāsya pratīcī dik puccham asau cāsau ca sakthyau /
GV05brup___u:36: dyauḥ pṛṣṭham antarikṣam udaram iyam uraḥ /
GV05brup___u:38: yatra kva caiti tad eva pratitiṣṭhaty evaṃ vidvān // BrhUp_1,2.3 //
GV05brup___u:40: sa manasā vācaṃ mithunaṃ samabhavad aśanāyā mṛtyuḥ /
GV05brup___u:41: tad yad reta āsīt sa saṃvatsaro 'bhavat /
GV05brup___u:42: na ha purā tataḥ saṃvatsara āsa /
GV05brup___u:43: tam etāvantaṃ kālam abibhar yāvānt saṃvatsaraḥ /
GV05brup___u:48: sa aikṣata yadi vā imam abhimaṃsye kanīyo 'nnaṃ kariṣya iti /
GV05brup___u:49: sa tayā vācā tenātmanedaṃ sarvam asṛjata yad idaṃ kiñca -- ṛco yajūṃṣi sāmāni chandāṃsi yajñān prajāṃ paśūn /
GV05brup___u:50: sa yad-yad evāsṛjata tattad attum adhriyata /
GV05brup___u:51: sarvaṃ vā attīti tad aditer adititvam /
GV05brup___u:52: sarvasyāttā bhavati sarvam asyānnaṃ bhavati ya evam etad aditer adititvaṃ veda // BrhUp_1,2.5 //
GV05brup___u:56: tasya śrāntasya taptasya yaśo vīryam udakrāmat /
GV05brup___u:59: tasya śarīra eva mana āsīt // BrhUp_1,2.6 //
GV05brup___u:60: so 'kāmayata -- medhyaṃ ma idaṃ syād ātmanvy anena syām iti /
GV05brup___u:62: yad aśvat tan medhyam abhūd iti tad evāśvamedhasyāśvamedhatvam /
GV05brup___u:63: eṣa ha vā aśvamedhaṃ veda ya enam evaṃ veda /
GV05brup___u:68: eṣa vā aśvamedho ya eṣa tapati /
GV05brup___u:73: so punar ekaiva devatā bhavati mṛtyur eva /
GV05brup___u:79: dvayā ha prājāpatyā devāś cāsurāś ca tataḥ kānīyasā eva devā jyāyasā asurāḥ /
GV05brup___u:81: te ha devā ūcur hantāsurān yajña udgīthenātyayāmeti // BrhUp_1,3.1 //
GV05brup___u:82: te ha vācam ūcus tvaṃ na udgāyeti /
GV05brup___u:84: yo vāci bhogas taṃ devebhya āgāyat /
GV05brup___u:88: sa yaḥ sa pāpmā yad evedam apratirūpaṃ vadati /
GV05brup___u:90: atha ha prāṇam ūcus tvaṃ na udgāyeti /
GV05brup___u:92: yaḥ prāṇe bhogas taṃ devebhya āgāyat /
GV05brup___u:96: sa yaḥ sa pāpmā yad evedam apratirūpaṃ jighrati /
GV05brup___u:98: atha ha cakṣur ūcus tvaṃ na udgāyeti /
GV05brup___u:100: yaś cakṣuṣi bhogas taṃ devebhya āgāyat /
GV05brup___u:104: sa yaḥ sa pāpmā yad evedam apratirūpaṃ paśyati /
GV05brup___u:106: atha ha śrotram ūcus tvaṃ na udgāyeti /
GV05brup___u:108: yaḥ śrotre bhogas taṃ devebhya āgāyat /
GV05brup___u:115: atha ha mana ūcus tvaṃ na udgāyeti /
GV05brup___u:117: yo manasi bhogas taṃ devebhya āgāyat /
GV05brup___u:124: evam u khalv etā devatāḥ pāpmabhir upāsṛjan /
GV05brup___u:126: atha hemam āsanyaṃ prāṇam ūcus tvaṃ na udgāyeti /
GV05brup___u:130: sa yathāśmānam ṛtvā loṣṭo vidhvaṃsetaivaṃ haiva vidhvaṃsamānā viṣvañco vineśuḥ /
GV05brup___u:133: parāsya dviṣan bhrātṛvyo bhavati ya evaṃ veda // BrhUp_1,3.7 //
GV05brup___u:134: te hocuḥ -- kva nu so 'bhūd yo na ittham asakteti /
GV05brup___u:137: sā vā eṣā devatā dūr nāma /
GV05brup___u:139: dūraṃ ha vā asmān mṛtyur bhavati ya evaṃ veda // BrhUp_1,3.9 //
GV05brup___u:140: sā vā eṣā devataitāsāṃ devatānāṃ pāpmānaṃ mṛtyum apahatya yatrāsāṃ diśām antas tad gamayāṃ cakāra /
GV05brup___u:142: tasmān na janam iyān nāntam iyān net pāpmānaṃ mṛtyum anvavāyānīti // BrhUp_1,3.10 //
GV05brup___u:143: sā vā eṣā devataitāsāṃ devatānāṃ pāpmānaṃ mṛtyum apahatyāthainā mṛtyum atyavahat // BrhUp_1,3.11 //
GV05brup___u:144: sā vai vācam eva prathamām atyavahat /
GV05brup___u:145: sā yadā mṛtyum atyamucyata so 'gnir abhavat /
GV05brup___u:146: so 'yam agniḥ pareṇa mṛtyum atikrānto dīpyate // BrhUp_1,3.12 //
GV05brup___u:148: sa yadā mṛtyum atyamucyata sa vāyur abhavat /
GV05brup___u:149: so 'yaṃ vāyuḥ pareṇa mṛtyum atikrāntaḥ pavate // BrhUp_1,3.13 //
GV05brup___u:151: tad yadā mṛtyum atyamucyata sa ādityo 'bhavat /
GV05brup___u:152: so 'sāv ādityaḥ pareṇa mṛtyum atikrāntas tapati // BrhUp_1,3.14 //
GV05brup___u:154: tad yadā mṛtyum atyamucyata tā diśo 'bhavan /
GV05brup___u:155: tā imā diśaḥ pareṇa mṛtyum atikrāntāḥ // BrhUp_1,3.15 //
GV05brup___u:157: tad yadā mṛtyum atyamucyata sa candramā abhavat /
GV05brup___u:158: so 'sau candraḥ pareṇa mṛtyum atikrānto bhāti /
GV05brup___u:159: evaṃ ha vā enam eṣā devatā mṛtyum ativahati ya evaṃ veda // BrhUp_1,3.16 //
GV05brup___u:161: yad dhi kiñcānnam adyate 'nenaiva tad adyate /
GV05brup___u:164: etāvad vā idaṃ sarvaṃ yad annam /
GV05brup___u:169: tasmād yad anenānnam atti tenaitās tṛpyanti /
GV05brup___u:170: evaṃ ha vā enaṃ svā abhisaṃviśanti bhartā svānāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ puraetā bhavaty annādo 'dhipatir ya evaṃ veda /
GV05brup___u:171: ya u haivaṃvidaṃ sveṣu pratir bubhūṣati na haivālaṃ bhāryebhyo bhavati /
GV05brup___u:172: atha ya evaitam anubhavati yo vaitam anu bhāryān bubhūrṣati sa haivālaṃ bhāryebhyo bhavati // BrhUp_1,3.18 //
GV05brup___u:176: tasmād yasmāt kasmāccāṅgāt prāṇa utkrāmati tad eva tac chuṣyati /
GV05brup___u:177: eṣa hi vā aṅgānāṃ rasaḥ // BrhUp_1,3.19 //
GV05brup___u:180: tasyā eṣa patis tasmād u bṛhaspatiḥ // BrhUp_1,3.20 //
GV05brup___u:183: tasyā eṣa patis tasmād u brahmaṇaspatiḥ // BrhUp_1,3.21 //
GV05brup___u:185: vāg vai sāmaiṣa sā cāmaś ceti tat sāmnaḥ sāmatvam /
GV05brup___u:186: yad v eva samaḥ pluṣiṇā samo maśakena samo nāgena sama ebhis tribhir lokaiḥ samo 'nena sarveṇa tasmād v eva sāma /
GV05brup___u:188: ya evam etat sāma veda // BrhUp_1,3.22 //
GV05brup___u:190: prāṇo vā ut prāṇena hīdaṃ sarvam uttabdham /
GV05brup___u:194: tad dhāpi brahmadattaś caikitāneyo rājānaṃ bhakṣayann uvāca /
GV05brup___u:195: ayaṃ tyasya rājā mūrdhānaṃ vipātayatād yad ito 'yāsya āṅgiraso 'nyenodagāyad iti /
GV05brup___u:196: vācā ca hy eva sa prāṇena codagāyad iti // BrhUp_1,3.24 //
GV05brup___u:197: tasya haitasya sāmno yaḥ svaṃ veda bhavati hāsya svam /
GV05brup___u:199: tasmād ārtvijyaṃ kariṣyan vāci svaram iccheta /
GV05brup___u:203: bhavati hāsya svaṃ ya evam etat sāmnaḥ svaṃ veda // BrhUp_1,3.25 //
GV05brup___u:204: tasya haitasya sāmno yaḥ suvarṇaṃ veda bhavati hāsya suvarṇam /
GV05brup___u:206: bhavati hāsya suvarṇaṃ ya evam etat sāmnaḥ suvarṇaṃ veda // BrhUp_1,3.26 //
GV05brup___u:207: tasya haitasya sāmno yaḥ pratiṣṭhāṃ veda prati ha tiṣṭhati /
GV05brup___u:209: vāci hi khalv eṣa etat prāṇaḥ pratiṣṭhito gīyate /
GV05brup___u:210: anna ity u haika āhuḥ // BrhUp_1,3.27 //
GV05brup___u:212: sa vai khalu prastotā sāma prastauti /
GV05brup___u:213: sa yatra prastuyāt tad etāni japet /
GV05brup___u:217: sa yad āhāsato mā sad gamayeti /
GV05brup___u:218: mṛtyur vā asat sad amṛtaṃ mṛtyor māmṛtaṃ gamayāmṛtaṃ mā kurv ity evaitad āha /
GV05brup___u:220: mṛtyur vai tamo jyotir amṛtaṃ mṛtyor māmṛtaṃ gamayāmṛtaṃ mā kurv ity evaitad āha /
GV05brup___u:223: atha yānītarāṇi stotrāṇi teṣv ātmane 'nnādyam āgāyet /
GV05brup___u:226: sa eṣa evaṃvid udgātātmane vā yajamānāya vā yaṃ kāmaṃ kāmayate tam āgāyati /
GV05brup___u:228: na haivālokyatāyā āśāsti ya evam etat sāma veda // BrhUp_1,3.28 //
GV05brup___u:233: tasmād apy etarhy āmantrito 'ham ayam ity evāgra uktvāthānyan nāma prabrūte yad asya bhavati /
GV05brup___u:234: sa yat pūrvo 'smāt sarvasmāt sarvān pāpmana auṣat tasmāt puruṣaḥ /
GV05brup___u:235: oṣati ha vai sa taṃ yo 'smāt pūrvo bubhūṣati ya evaṃ veda // BrhUp_1,4.1 //
GV05brup___u:238: yan mad anyan nāsti kasmān nu bibhemīti /
GV05brup___u:245: sa haitāvān āsa yathā strīpumāṃsau sampariṣvaktau /
GV05brup___u:248: tasmād idam ardhabṛgalam iva sva iti ha smāha yājñavalkyaḥ /
GV05brup___u:249: tasmād ayam ākāśaḥ striyā pūryata eva /
GV05brup___u:252: so heyam īkṣāṃ cakre -- kathaṃ nu mātmana eva janayitvā sambhavati /
GV05brup___u:265: evam eva yad idaṃ kiñca mithunam ā pipīlikābhyas tat sarvam asṛjata // BrhUp_1,4.4 //
GV05brup___u:266: so 'ved ahaṃ vāva sṛṣṭir asmy ahaṃ hīdaṃ sarvam asṛkṣīti /
GV05brup___u:268: sṛṣṭyāṃ hāsyaitasyāṃ bhavati ya evaṃ veda // BrhUp_1,4.5 //
GV05brup___u:270: sa mukhāc ca yoner hastābhyāṃ cāgnim asṛjata /
GV05brup___u:273: tad yad idam āhur amuṃ yajāmuṃ yajety ekaikaṃ devam etasyaiva sā visṛṣṭiḥ /
GV05brup___u:274: eṣa u hy eva sarve devāḥ /
GV05brup___u:275: atha yat kiñcedam ārdraṃ tad retaso 'sṛjata /
GV05brup___u:277: etāvad vā idaṃ sarvam annaṃ caivānnādaś ca /
GV05brup___u:280: yac chreyaso devān asṛjatātha yan martyaḥ sann amṛtān asṛjata tasmād atisṛṣṭir /
GV05brup___u:281: atisṛṣṭyāṃ hāsyaitasyāṃ bhavati ya evaṃ veda // BrhUp_1,4.6 //
GV05brup___u:283: tan nāmarūpābhyām eva vyākriyatāsau nāmāyam idaṃrūpa iti /
GV05brup___u:284: tad idam apy etarhi nāmarūpābhyām eva vyākriyata asau nāmāyam idaṃrūpa iti /
GV05brup___u:285: sa eṣa iha praviṣṭa ā nakhāgrebhyo yathā kṣuraḥ kṣuradhāne 'vahitaḥ syād viśvambharo vā viśvambharakulāye /
GV05brup___u:287: akṛtsno hi saḥ prāṇann eva prāṇo nāma bhavati /
GV05brup___u:288: vadan vāk paśyaṃś cakṣuḥ śṛṇvañ chrotraṃ manvāno manaḥ /
GV05brup___u:290: sa yo 'ta ekaikam upāste na sa veda /
GV05brup___u:293: atra hy ete sarva ekaṃ bhavanti /
GV05brup___u:294: tad etat padanīyam asya sarvasya yad ayam ātmā /
GV05brup___u:296: yathā ha vai padenānuvinded evaṃ kīrtiṃ ślokaṃ vindate ya evaṃ veda // BrhUp_1,4.7 //
GV05brup___u:297: tad etat preyaḥ putrāt preyo vittāt preyo 'nyasmāt sarvasmād antarataraṃ yad ayam ātmā /
GV05brup___u:298: sa yo 'nyam ātmanaḥ priyaṃ bruvāṇaṃ brūyāt priyaṃ rotsyatītīśvaro ha tathaiva syāt /
GV05brup___u:300: sa ya ātmānam eva priyam upāste na hāsya priyaṃ pramāyukaṃ bhavati // BrhUp_1,4.8 //
GV05brup___u:301: tad āhur yad brahmavidyayā sarvaṃ bhaviṣyanto manuṣyā manyante /
GV05brup___u:302: kim u tad brahmāved yasmāt tat sarvam abhavad iti // BrhUp_1,4.9 //
GV05brup___u:307: tad yo yo devānāṃ pratyabudhyata sa eva tad abhavat /
GV05brup___u:310: tad dhaitat paśyann ṛṣir vāmadevaḥ pratipede 'haṃ manur abhavaṃ sūryaś ceti /
GV05brup___u:311: tad idam apy etarhi ya evaṃ vedāhaṃ brahmāsmīti sa idaṃ sarvaṃ bhavati /
GV05brup___u:312: tasya ha na devāś canābhūtyā īśate /
GV05brup___u:314: atha yo 'nyāṃ devatām upāste 'nyo 'sāv anyo 'ham asmīti na sa veda /
GV05brup___u:316: yathā ha vai bahavaḥ paśavo manuṣyaṃ bhuñjyur evam ekaikaḥ puruṣo devān bhunakti /
GV05brup___u:317: ekasminn eva paśāv ādīyamāne 'priyaṃ bhavati kim u bahuṣu /
GV05brup___u:318: tasmād eṣāṃ tan na priyaṃ yad etan manuṣyā vidyuḥ // BrhUp_1,4.10 //
GV05brup___u:319: brahma vā idam agra āsīd ekam eva /
GV05brup___u:322: yāny etāni devatrā kṣatrāṇīndro varuṇaḥ somo rudraḥ parjanyo yamo mṛtyur īśāna iti /
GV05brup___u:324: tasmād brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyaṃ adhastād upāste rājasūye /
GV05brup___u:327: tasmād yady api rājā paramatāṃ gacchati brahmaivāntata upaniśrayati svāṃ yonim /
GV05brup___u:328: ya u enaṃ hinasti svāṃ sa yonim ṛcchati /
GV05brup___u:329: sa pāpīyān bhavati yathā śreyāṃsaṃ hiṃsitvā // BrhUp_1,4.11 //
GV05brup___u:332: yāny etāni devajātāni gaṇaśa ākhyāyante vasavo rudrā ādityā viśve devā maruta iti // BrhUp_1,4.12 //
GV05brup___u:336: iyaṃ hīdaṃ sarvaṃ puṣyati yad idaṃ kiñca // BrhUp_1,4.13 //
GV05brup___u:339: tad etat kṣatrasya kṣatraṃ yad dharmaḥ /
GV05brup___u:343: yo vai sa dharmaḥ satyaṃ vai tat /
GV05brup___u:344: tasmāt satyaṃ vadantam āhur dharmaṃ vadatīti /
GV05brup___u:346: etad dhy evaitad ubhayaṃ bhavati // BrhUp_1,4.14 //
GV05brup___u:347: tad etad brahma kṣatraṃ viṭ śūdraḥ /
GV05brup___u:348: tad agninaiva deveṣu brahmābhavad brāhmaṇo manuṣyeṣu,
GV05brup___u:352: tasmād agnāv eva deveṣu lokam icchante brāhmaṇe manuṣyeṣu /
GV05brup___u:354: atha yo ha vā asmāl lokāt svaṃ lokam adṛṣṭvā praiti sa enam avidito na bhunakti yathā vedo vānanūkto 'nyad vā karmākṛtam /
GV05brup___u:355: yadi ha vā apy anevaṃvin mahatpuṇyaṃ karma karoti tad dhāsyāntataḥ kṣīyata eva /
GV05brup___u:357: sa ya ātmānam eva lokam upāste na hāsya karma kṣīyate /
GV05brup___u:358: asmād dhy evātmano yadyat kāmayate tattat sṛjate // BrhUp_1,4.15 //
GV05brup___u:359: atho ayaṃ vā ātmā sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ lokaḥ /
GV05brup___u:360: sa yaj juhoti yad yajate tena devānāṃ lokaḥ /
GV05brup___u:362: atha yat pitṛbhyo nipṛṇāti yat prajām icchate tena pitṝṇām /
GV05brup___u:363: atha yan manuṣyān vāsayate yad ebhyo 'śanaṃ dadāti tena manuṣyāṇām /
GV05brup___u:364: atha yat paśubhyas tṛṇodakaṃ vindati tena paśūnām /
GV05brup___u:365: yad asya gṛheṣu śvāpadā vayāṃsy ā pipīlikābhya upajīvanti tena teṣāṃ lokaḥ /
GV05brup___u:366: yathā ha vai svāya lokāyāriṣṭim icchet /
GV05brup___u:367: evaṃ haivaṃvide sarvadā sarvāṇi bhūtāny ariṣṭim icchanti /
GV05brup___u:368: tad vā etad viditaṃ mīmāṃsitam // BrhUp_1,4.16 //
GV05brup___u:370: so 'kāmayata jāyā me syād atha prajāyeya /
GV05brup___u:371: atha vittaṃ me syād atha karma kurvīyeti /
GV05brup___u:374: tasmād apy etarhy ekākī kāmayate -- jāyā me syād atha prajāyeyātha vittaṃ me syād atha karma kurvīyeti /
GV05brup___u:375: sa yāvad apy eteṣām ekaikaṃ na prāpnoty akṛtsna eva tāvan manyate /
GV05brup___u:389: pāṅktam idaṃ sarvaṃ yad idaṃ kiñca /
GV05brup___u:390: tad idaṃ sarvam āpnoti ya evaṃ veda // BrhUp_1,4.17 //
GV05brup___u:392: ekam asya sādhāraṇaṃ dve devān abhājayat /
GV05brup___u:394: tasmin sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitaṃ yacca prāṇiti yacca na /
GV05brup___u:395: kasmāt tāni na kṣīyante adyamānāni sarvadā /
GV05brup___u:396: yo vai tām akṣitiṃ veda so 'nnam atti pratīkena /
GV05brup___u:397: sa devān apigacchati sa ūṛjam upajīvati /
GV05brup___u:400: medhayā hi tapasājanayat pitaikam asya sādhāraṇam iti /
GV05brup___u:401: idam evāsya tat sādhāraṇam annaṃ yad idam adyate /
GV05brup___u:402: sa ya etad upāste na sa pāpmano vyāvartate /
GV05brup___u:406: tasmād devebhyo juhvati ca pra ca juhvati /
GV05brup___u:411: payo hy evāgre manuṣyāś ca paśavaś copajīvanti /
GV05brup___u:412: tasmāt kumāraṃ jātaṃ ghṛtaṃ vaivāgre pratilehayanti stanaṃ vānudhāpayanti /
GV05brup___u:413: atha vatsaṃ jātam āhus tṛṇād iti /
GV05brup___u:414: tasmin sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitaṃ yacca prāṇiti yacca neti /
GV05brup___u:415: payasi hīdaṃ sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitaṃ yacca prāṇiti yacca na /
GV05brup___u:416: tad yad idam āhuḥ saṃvatsaraṃ payasā juhvad apa punarmṛtyuṃ jayatīti /
GV05brup___u:418: yad ahar eva juhoti tad ahaḥ punarmṛtyum apajayaty evaṃ vidvān /
GV05brup___u:420: kasmāt tāni na kṣīyante adyamānāni sarvadeti /
GV05brup___u:422: sa hīdam annaṃ punaḥ punar janayate /
GV05brup___u:425: sa hīdam annaṃ dhiyādhiyā janayate karmabhiḥ /
GV05brup___u:426: yad dhaitan na kuryāt kṣīyeta ha /
GV05brup___u:429: sa devān apigacchati sa ūrjam upajīvatīti praśaṃsā // BrhUp_1,5.2 //
GV05brup___u:432: anyatramanā abhūvaṃ nādarśam anyatramanā abhūvaṃ nāśrauṣam iti manasā hy eva paśyati manasā śṛṇoti /
GV05brup___u:433: kāmaḥ saṃkalpo vicikitsā śraddhāśraddhā dhṛtir adhṛtir hrīr dhīr bhīr ity etat sarvaṃ mana eva /
GV05brup___u:434: tasmād api pṛṣṭhata upaspṛṣṭo manasā vijānāti /
GV05brup___u:435: yaḥ kaśca śabdo vāg eva sā /
GV05brup___u:436: eṣā hy antaṃ āyattaiṣā hi na /
GV05brup___u:437: prāṇo 'pāno vyāna udānaḥ samāno 'na ity etat sarvaṃ prāṇa eva /
GV05brup___u:441: vāg evāyaṃ loko mano 'ntarikṣalokaḥ prāṇo 'sau lokaḥ // BrhUp_1,5.4 //
GV05brup___u:443: vāg evargvedo mano yajurvedaḥ prāṇaḥ sāmavedaḥ // BrhUp_1,5.5 //
GV05brup___u:448: mana eva pitā vāṅ mātā prāṇaḥ prajā // BrhUp_1,5.7 //
GV05brup___u:450: yat kiñca vijñātaṃ vācas tad rūpam /
GV05brup___u:453: yat kiñca vijijñāsyaṃ manasas tad rūpam /
GV05brup___u:461: tad yāvaty eva vāk tāvatī pṛthivī tāvān ayam agniḥ // BrhUp_1,5.11 //
GV05brup___u:464: tad yāvad eva manas tāvatī dyaus tāvān asāv ādityaḥ /
GV05brup___u:470: nāsya sapatno bhavati ya evaṃ veda // BrhUp_1,5.12 //
GV05brup___u:473: tad yāvān eva prāṇas tāvatya āpas tāvān asau candraḥ /
GV05brup___u:474: ta ete sarva eva samāḥ sarve 'nantāḥ /
GV05brup___u:475: sa yo haitān antavata upāste 'ntavantaṃ sa lokaṃ jayati /
GV05brup___u:476: atha yo haitān anantān upāste 'nantaṃ sa lokaṃ jayati // BrhUp_1,5.13 //
GV05brup___u:480: sa rātribhir evā ca pūryate 'pa ca kṣīyate /
GV05brup___u:481: so 'māvāsyāṃ rātrim etayā ṣoḍaśyā kalayā sarvam idaṃ prāṇabhṛd anupraviśya tataḥ prātar jāyate /
GV05brup___u:482: tasmād etāṃ rātriṃ prāṇabhṛtaḥ prāṇaṃ na vicchindyād api kṛkalāsasyaitasyā eva devatāyā apacityai // BrhUp_1,5.14 //
GV05brup___u:483: yo vai sa saṃvatsaraḥ prajāpatiḥ ṣoḍaśakālo 'yam eva sa yo 'yam evaṃvit puruṣaḥ /
GV05brup___u:486: sa vittenaivā ca pūryate 'pa ca kṣīyate /
GV05brup___u:487: tad etan nabhyaṃ yad ayam ātmā /
GV05brup___u:489: tasmād yady api sarvajyāniṃ jīyata ātmanā cej jīvati pradhināgād ity evāhuḥ // BrhUp_1,5.15 //
GV05brup___u:490: atha trayo vāva lokā manuṣyalokaḥ pitṛloko devaloka iti /
GV05brup___u:491: so 'yaṃ manuṣyalokaḥ putreṇaiva jayyo nānyena karmaṇā /
GV05brup___u:497: yadā praiṣyan manyate 'tha putram āha -- tvaṃ brahma tvaṃ yajñas tvaṃ loka iti /
GV05brup___u:498: sa putraḥ pratyāhāhaṃ brahmāhaṃ yajño 'ham loka iti /
GV05brup___u:499: yad vai kiñcānūktaṃ tasya sarvasya brahmety ekatā /
GV05brup___u:500: ye vai ke ca yajñās teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ yajña ity ekatā /
GV05brup___u:501: ye vai ke ca lokās teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ loka ity ekatā /
GV05brup___u:503: etan mā sarvaṃ sann ayam ito bhunajad iti /
GV05brup___u:506: sa yadaivaṃvid asmāl lokāt praity athaibhir eva prāṇaiḥ saha putram āviśati /
GV05brup___u:507: sa yady anena kiñcid akṣṇayā kṛtaṃ bhavati tasmād enaṃ sarvasmāt putro muñcati tasmāt putro nāma /
GV05brup___u:509: athainam ete devāḥ prāṇā amṛtā āviśanti // BrhUp_1,5.17 //
GV05brup___u:510: pṛthivyai cainam agneś ca daivī vāg āviśati /
GV05brup___u:511: sā vai daivī vāg yayā yad yad eva vadati tat tad bhavati // BrhUp_1,5.18 //
GV05brup___u:512: divaś cainam ādityāc ca daivaṃ mana āviśati /
GV05brup___u:513: tad vai daivaṃ mano yenānandy eva bhavaty atho na śocati // BrhUp_1,5.19 //
GV05brup___u:514: adbhyaś cainaṃ candramasaś ca daivaḥ prāṇa āviśati /
GV05brup___u:515: sa vai daivaḥ prāṇo yaḥ saṃcaraṃś cāsaṃcaraṃś ca na vyathate 'tho na riṣyati /
GV05brup___u:516: sa eṣa evaṃvit sarveṣāṃ bhūtānām ātmā bhavati /
GV05brup___u:518: yathaitāṃ devatāṃ sarvāṇi bhūtāny avanty evaṃ haivaṃvidaṃ sarvāṇi bhūtāny avanti /
GV05brup___u:519: yad u kiñcemāḥ prajāḥ śocanty amaivāsāṃ tad bhavati /
GV05brup___u:521: na ha vai devān pāpaṃ gacchati // BrhUp_1,5.20 //
GV05brup___u:535: athemam eva nāpnot yo 'yaṃ madhyamaḥ prāṇaḥ /
GV05brup___u:537: ayaṃ vai naḥ śreṣṭho yaḥ saṃcaraṃś cāsaṃcaraṃś ca na vyathate 'tho na riṣyati /
GV05brup___u:541: tena ha vāva tat kulam ācakṣate yasmin kule bhavati ya evaṃ veda /
GV05brup___u:543: anuśuṣya haivāntato mriyata ity adhyātmam // BrhUp_1,5.21 //
GV05brup___u:549: sa yathaiṣāṃ prāṇānāṃ madhyamaḥ prāṇa evam etāsāṃ devatānāṃ vāyuḥ /
GV05brup___u:550: mlocanti hy anyā devatā na vāyuḥ /
GV05brup___u:553: yataś codeti sūryo 'staṃ yatra ca gacchatīti /
GV05brup___u:554: prāṇād vā eṣa udeti prāṇe 'stam eti /
GV05brup___u:555: taṃ devāś cakrire dharmaṃ sa evādya sa u śva iti /
GV05brup___u:556: yad vā ete 'murhy adhriyanta tad evāpy adya kurvanti /
GV05brup___u:557: tasmād ekam eva vrataṃ caret prāṇyāc caivāpānyāc ca /
GV05brup___u:558: nen mā pāpmā mṛtyur āpnavad iti /
GV05brup___u:559: yady u caret samāpipayiṣet teno etasyai devatāyai sāyujyaṃ salokatāṃ jayati // BrhUp_1,5.23 //
GV05brup___u:560: trayaṃ vā idaṃ nāma rūpaṃ karma /
GV05brup___u:561: teṣāṃ nāmnāṃ vāg ity etad eṣām uktham /
GV05brup___u:566: etad dhi sarvāṇi nāmāni bibharti // BrhUp_1,6.1 //
GV05brup___u:567: atha rūpāṇāṃ cakṣur ity etad eṣām uktham /
GV05brup___u:572: etad dhi sarvāṇi rūpāṇi bibharti // BrhUp_1,6.2 //
GV05brup___u:573: atha karmaṇām ātmety etad eṣām uktham /
GV05brup___u:579: tad etat trayaṃ sad ekam ayam ātmā /
GV05brup___u:586: sa hovācājātaśatruṃ kāśyaṃ -- brahma te bravāṇīti /
GV05brup___u:587: sa hovācājātaśatruḥ -- sahasram etasyāṃ vāci dadmaḥ,
GV05brup___u:588: janako janaka iti vai janā dhāvantīti // BrhUp_2,1.1 //
GV05brup___u:589: sa hovāca gārgyaḥ -- ya evāsāv āditye puruṣa etam evāhaṃ brahmopāsa iti /
GV05brup___u:591: atiṣṭhāḥ sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ mūrdhā rājeti vā aham etam upāsa iti /
GV05brup___u:592: sa ya etam evam upāste 'tiṣṭhāḥ sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ mūrdhā rājā bhavati // BrhUp_2,1.2 //
GV05brup___u:593: sa hovāca gārgyaḥ -- ya evāsau candre puruṣa etam evāhaṃ brahmopāsa iti /
GV05brup___u:595: bṛhan pāṇdaravāsāḥ somo rājeti vā aham etam upāsa iti /
GV05brup___u:596: sa ya etam evam upāste 'har-ahar sutaḥ prasuto bhavati /
GV05brup___u:598: sa hovāca gārgyaḥ -- ya evāsau vidyuti puruṣa etam evāhaṃ brahmopāsa iti /
GV05brup___u:600: tejasvīti vā aham etam upāsa iti /
GV05brup___u:601: sa ya etam evam upāste tejasvī ha bhavati /
GV05brup___u:603: sa hovāca gārgyaḥ -- ya evāyam ākāśe puruṣa etam evāhaṃ brahmopāsa iti /
GV05brup___u:605: pūrṇam apravartīti vā aham etam upāsa iti /
GV05brup___u:606: sa ya etam evam upāste pūryate prajayā paśubhir nāsyāsmāl lokāt prajodvartate // BrhUp_2,1.5 //
GV05brup___u:607: sa hovāca gārgyaḥ -- ya evāyaṃ vāyau puruṣa etam evāhaṃ brahmopāsa iti /
GV05brup___u:609: indro vaikuṇṭho 'parājitā seneti vā aham etam upāsa iti /
GV05brup___u:610: sa ya etam evam upāste jiṣṇur hāparājiṣṇur bhavaty anyatastyajāyī // BrhUp_2,1.6 //
GV05brup___u:611: sa hovāca gārgyaḥ -- ya evāyam agnau puruṣa etam evāhaṃ brahmopāsa iti /
GV05brup___u:613: viṣāsahir iti vā aham etam upāsa iti /
GV05brup___u:614: sa ya etam evam upāste viṣāsahir ha bhavati /
GV05brup___u:616: sa hovāca gārgyaḥ -- ya evāyam apsu puruṣa etam evāhaṃ brahmopāsa iti /
GV05brup___u:618: pratirūpa iti vā aham etam upāsa iti /
GV05brup___u:619: sa ya etam evam upāste pratirūpaṃ haivainam upagacchati nāpratirūpam /
GV05brup___u:621: sa hovāca gārgyaḥ -- ya evāyam ādarśe puruṣa etam evāhaṃ brahmopāsa iti /
GV05brup___u:623: rociṣṇur iti vā aham etam upāsa iti /
GV05brup___u:624: sa ya etam evam upāste rociṣṇur ha bhavati /
GV05brup___u:628: sa hovāca gārgyaḥ -- ya evāyaṃ yantaṃ paścāc chabbo 'nūdety etam evāhaṃ brahmopāsa iti /
GV05brup___u:630: asur iti vā aham etam upāsa iti /
GV05brup___u:631: sa ya etam evam upāste sarvaṃ haivāsmiṃl loka āyur eti /
GV05brup___u:632: nainaṃ purā kālāt prāṇo jahāti // BrhUp_2,1.10 //
GV05brup___u:633: sa hovāca gārgyaḥ -- ya evāyaṃ dikṣu puruṣa etam evāhaṃ brahmopāsa iti /
GV05brup___u:635: dvitīyo 'napaga iti vā aham etam upāsa iti /
GV05brup___u:636: sa ya etam evam upāste dvitīyavān ha bhavati /
GV05brup___u:638: sa hovāca gārgyaḥ -- ya evāyaṃ chāyāmayaḥ puruṣa etam evāhaṃ brahmopāsa iti /
GV05brup___u:640: mṛtyur iti vā aham etam upāsa iti /
GV05brup___u:641: sa ya etam evam upāste sarvaṃ haivāsmiṃl loka āyur eti /
GV05brup___u:642: nainaṃ purā kālān mṛtyur āgacchati // BrhUp_2,1.12 //
GV05brup___u:643: sa hovāca gārgyaḥ -- ya evāyam ātmani puruṣa etam evāhaṃ brahmopāsa iti /
GV05brup___u:645: ātmanvīti vā aham etam upāsa iti /
GV05brup___u:646: sa ya etam evam upāsta ātmanvī ha bhavati /
GV05brup___u:648: sa ha tūṣṇīm āsa gārgyaḥ // BrhUp_2,1.13 //
GV05brup___u:652: sa hovāca gārgyaḥ -- upa tvāyānīti // BrhUp_2,1.14 //
GV05brup___u:653: sa hovācājātaśatruḥ -- pratilomaṃ caitad yad brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyam upeyād brahma me vakṣyatīti /
GV05brup___u:657: tam etair nāmabhir āmantrayāṃ cakre bṛhan pāṇdaravāsaḥ soma rājann iti /
GV05brup___u:661: sa hovācājātaśatruḥ -- yatraiṣa etat supto 'bhūd ya eṣa vijñānamayaḥ puruṣaḥ kvaiṣa tadābhūt kuta etad āgād iti /
GV05brup___u:662: tad u ha na mene gārgyaḥ // BrhUp_2,1.16 //
GV05brup___u:663: sa hovācājātaśatruḥ -- yatraiṣa etat supto 'bhūd ya eṣa vijñānamayaḥ puruṣas tad eṣāṃ prāṇānāṃ vijñānena vijnānam ādāya ya eṣo 'ntar hṛdaya ākāśas tasmiñ chete /
GV05brup___u:671: sa yatraitat svapnyayā carati te hāsya lokāḥ /
GV05brup___u:672: tad uteva mahārājo bhavaty uteva mahābrāhmaṇaḥ /
GV05brup___u:674: sa yathā mahārājo jānapadān gṛhītvā sve janapade yathākāmaṃ parivartetaivam evaiṣa etat prāṇān gṛhītvā sve śarīre yathākāmaṃ parivartate //
GV05brup___u:677: hitā nāma nādyo dvāsaptatiḥ sahasrāṇi hṛdayāt purītatam abhipratiṣṭhante /
GV05brup___u:679: sa yathā kumāro add. vā mahārājo vā mahābrāhmaṇo vātighnīm ānandasya gatvā śayīta /
GV05brup___u:681: sa yathorṇavābhis tantunoccared yathā agneḥ kṣudrā viṣphuliṅgā vyuccaranty evam evāsmād ātmanaḥ sarve prāṇāḥ sarve lokāḥ sarve devāḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni vyuccaranti /
GV05brup___u:683: prāṇā vai satyaṃ teṣām eṣa satyam // BrhUp_2,1.20 //
GV05brup___u:684: yo ha vai śiśuṃ sādhānaṃ sapratyādhānaṃ sasthūṇaṃ sadāmaṃ veda sapta ha dviṣato bhrātṛvyān avaruṇaddhi /
GV05brup___u:685: ayaṃ vāva śiśur yo 'yaṃ madhyamaḥ prāṇaḥ /
GV05brup___u:686: tasyedam evādhānam idaṃ pratyādhānaṃ prāṇaḥ sthūṇānnaṃ dāma // BrhUp_2,2.1 //
GV05brup___u:688: tad yā imā akṣaṃl lohinyo rājayas tābhir enaṃ rudro 'nvāyattaḥ /
GV05brup___u:689: atha yā akṣann āpas tābhiḥ parjanyaḥ /
GV05brup___u:695: nāsyānnaṃ kṣīyate ya evaṃ veda // BrhUp_2,2.2 //
GV05brup___u:697: arvāgbilaś camasa ūrdhvabudhnas tasmin yaśo nihitaṃ viśvarūpam /
GV05brup___u:698: tasyāsata ṛṣayaḥ sapta tīre vāg aṣṭamī brahmaṇā saṃvidāneti /
GV05brup___u:700: idaṃ tac charīra eṣa hy arvāgbilaś camasa ūrdhvabudhnaḥ /
GV05brup___u:708: vāg ghy aṣṭamī brahmaṇā saṃvitte // BrhUp_2,2.3 //
GV05brup___u:717: attir ha vai nāmaitad yad autrir iti /
GV05brup___u:719: sarvam asyānnaṃ bhavati ya evaṃ veda // BrhUp_2,2.4 //
GV05brup___u:725: tad etan mūrtaṃ yad anyad vāyoś cāntarikṣāc ca /
GV05brup___u:729: tasyaitasya mūrtasyaitasya martyasyaitasya sthitasyaitasya sata eṣa raso ya eṣa tapati /
GV05brup___u:736: tasyaitasyāmūrtasyaitasyāmṛtasyaitasya yata etasya tyasyaiṣa raso ya eṣa etasmin maṇḍale puruṣaḥ /
GV05brup___u:740: idam eva mūrtaṃ yad anyat prāṇāc ca yaś cāyam antar ātmann ākāśaḥ /
GV05brup___u:744: tasyaitasya mūrtasyaitasya martyasyaitasya sthitasyaitasya sata eṣa raso yac cakṣuḥ /
GV05brup___u:746: athāmūrtaṃ prāṇaś ca yaś cāyam antar ātmann ākāśaḥ /
GV05brup___u:750: tasyaitasyāmūrtasyaitasyāmṛtasyaitasya yata etasya tyasyaiṣa raso yo 'yaṃ dakṣiṇe 'kṣan puruṣaḥ /
GV05brup___u:753: yathā māhārajanaṃ vāso yathā pāṇḍvāvikaṃ yathendragopo yathāgnyarcir yathā puṇḍarīkaṃ yathā sakṛdvidyuttam /
GV05brup___u:754: sakṛdvidyutteva ha vā asya śrīr bhavati ya evaṃ veda /
GV05brup___u:756: na hy etasmād iti nety anyat param asti /
GV05brup___u:760: maitreyīti hovāca yājñavalkyaḥ -- udyāsyan vā are 'ham asmāt sthānād asmi /
GV05brup___u:762: sā hovāca maitreyī -- yan nu ma iyaṃ bhagoḥ sarvā pṛthivī vittena pūrṇā syāt kathaṃ tenāmṛtā syām iti /
GV05brup___u:764: yathaivopakaraṇavatāṃ jīvitaṃ tathaiva te jīvitaṃ syāt /
GV05brup___u:766: sā hovāca maitreyī -- yenāhaṃ nāmṛtā syāṃ kim ahaṃ tena kuryām /
GV05brup___u:767: yad eva bhagavān veda tad eva me brūhīti // BrhUp_2,4.3 //
GV05brup___u:768: sa hovāca yājñavalkyaḥ -- priyā batāre naḥ satī priyaṃ bhāṣase /
GV05brup___u:772: sa hovāca -- na vā are patyuḥ kāmāya patiḥ priyo bhavaty ātmanas tu kāmāya patiḥ priyo bhavati /
GV05brup___u:773: na vā are jāyāyai kāmāya jāyā priyā bhavaty ātmanas tu kāmāya jāyā priyā bhavati /
GV05brup___u:774: na vā are putrāṇāṃ kāmāya putrāḥ priyā bhavanty ātmanas tu kāmāya putrāḥ priyā bhavanti /
GV05brup___u:775: na vā are vittasya kāmāya vittaṃ priyaṃ bhavaty ātmanas tu kāmāya vittaṃ priyaṃ bhavati /
GV05brup___u:776: na vā are brahmaṇaḥ kāmāya brahma priyaṃ bhavaty ātmanas tu kāmāya brahma priyaṃ bhavati /
GV05brup___u:777: na vā are kṣatrasya kāmāya kṣatraṃ priyaṃ bhavaty ātmanas tu kāmāya kṣatraṃ priyaṃ bhavati /
GV05brup___u:778: na vā are lokānāṃ kāmāya lokāḥ priyā bhavanty ātmanas tu kāmāya lokāḥ priyā bhavanti /
GV05brup___u:779: na vā are devānāṃ kāmāya devāḥ priyā bhavanty ātmanas tu kāmāya devāḥ priyā bhavanti /
GV05brup___u:780: na vā are bhūtānāṃ kāmāya bhūtāni priyāṇi bhavanty ātmanas tu kāmāya bhūtāni priyāṇi bhavanti /
GV05brup___u:781: na vā are sarvasya kāmāya sarvaṃ priyaṃ bhavaty ātmanas tu kāmāya sarvaṃ priyaṃ bhavati /
GV05brup___u:782: ātmā vā are draṣṭavyaḥ śrotavyo mantavyo nididhyāsitavyo maitreyi /
GV05brup___u:783: ātmano vā are darśanena śravaṇena matyā vijñānenedaṃ sarvaṃ viditam // BrhUp_2,4.5 //
GV05brup___u:784: brahma taṃ parādād yo 'nyatrātmano brahma veda /
GV05brup___u:785: kṣatraṃ taṃ parādād yo 'nyatrātmanaḥ kṣatraṃ veda /
GV05brup___u:786: lokās taṃ parādur yo 'nyatrātmano lokān veda /
GV05brup___u:787: devās taṃ parādur yo 'nyatrātmano devān veda /
GV05brup___u:788: bhūtāni taṃ parādur yo 'nyatrātmano bhūtāni veda /
GV05brup___u:789: sarvaṃ taṃ parādād yo 'nyatrātmanaḥ sarvaṃ veda /
GV05brup___u:790: idaṃ brahmedaṃ kṣatram ime lokā ime devā imāni bhūtānīdaṃ sarvaṃ yad ayam ātmā // BrhUp_2,4.6 //
GV05brup___u:791: sa yathā dundubher hanyamānasya na bāhyāñ chabdāñ chaknuyād grahaṇāya /

GV05brup___u:793: sa yathā śaṅkhasya dhmāyamānasya na bāhyāñ chabdāñ chaknuyād grahaṇāya śaṅkhasya tu grahaṇena śaṅkhadhmasya vā śabdo gṛhītaḥ // BrhUp_2,4.8
GV05brup___u:794: sa yathā vīṇāyai vādyamānāyai na bāhyāñ chabdāñ chaknuyād grahaṇāya vīṇāyai tu grahaṇena vīṇāvādasya vā śabdo gṛhītaḥ // BrhUp_2,4.9 //
GV05brup___u:795: sa yathārdraidhāgner abhyāhitāt pṛthag dhūmā viniścaranty eva vā are 'sya mahato

GV05brup___u:797: purāṇaṃ vidyā upaniṣadaḥ ślokāḥ sūtrāṇy anuvyākhyānāni vyākhyānani /

GV05brup___u:812: sa yathā saindhavakhilya udake prāsta udakam evānuvilīyeta na hāsyodgrahaṇāyeva syāt /

GV05brup___u:819: sa hovāca -- na vā are 'haṃ mohaṃ bravīmi /

GV05brup___u:890: idaṃ vai tan madhu dadhyaṅṅ ātharvaṇo 'śvibhyām uvāca /
GV05brup___u:891: tad etad ṛṣiḥ paśyann avocat -- ātharvaṇāyāśvinau dadhīce 'śvyaṃ śiraḥ praty airayatam /
GV05brup___u:892: sa vāṃ madhu pra vocad ṛtāyan tvāṣṭraṃ yad dasrāv apikakṣyaṃ vām iti // BrhUp_2,5.17 //

GV05brup___u:894: tad etad ṛṣiḥ paśyann avocat -- puraś cakre dvipadaḥ puraś cakre catuṣpadaḥ /
GV05brup___u:895: puraḥ sa pakṣī bhutvā puraḥ puruṣa āviśad iti /

GV05brup___u:900: tad etad ṛṣiḥ paśyann avocat -- rūpaṃrūpaṃ pratirūpo babhūva tad asya rūpaṃ praticakṣaṇāya /
GV05brup___u:901: indro māyābhiḥ pururūpa īyate yuktā hy asya harayaḥ śatā daśeti /
GV05brup___u:902: ayaṃ vai harayo 'yaṃ vai daśa ca sahasraṇi bahūni cānantāni ca /
GV05brup___u:903: tad etad brahmāpūrvam anaparam anantaram abāhyam /
GV05brup___u:968: tatra ha kurupañcālānāṃ brāhmaṇā abhisametā babhūvuḥ /
GV05brup___u:969: tasya ha janakasya vaidehasya vijijñāsā babhūva -- kaḥ svid eṣāṃ brāhmaṇānām anūcānatama iti /

GV05brup___u:972: tān hovāca -- brāhmaṇā bhagavanto yo vo brahmiṣṭhaḥ sa etā gā udajatām iti /
GV05brup___u:974: atha ha yājñavalkyaḥ svam eva brahmacāriṇam uvāca -- etāḥ saumyodaja sāmaśravā3 iti /
GV05brup___u:978: atha ha janakasya vaidehasya hotāśvalo babhūva /
GV05brup___u:979: sa hainaṃ papraccha -- tvaṃ nu khalu no yājñavalkya brahmiṣṭho 'sī3 iti /
GV05brup___u:980: sa hovāca -- namo vayaṃ brahmiṣṭhāya kurmo gokāmā eva vayaṃ sma iti /
GV05brup___u:981: taṃ ha tata eva praṣṭuṃ dadhre hotāśvalaḥ // BrhUp_3,1.2 //
GV05brup___u:982: yājñavalkyeti hovāca -- yad idaṃ sarvaṃ mṛtyunāptaṃ sarvaṃ mṛtyunābhipannaṃ kena yajamāno mṛtyor āptim atimucyata iti /
GV05brup___u:985: tad yeyaṃ vāk so 'yam agniḥ sa hotā sā muktiḥ sātimuktiḥ // BrhUp_3,1.3 //
GV05brup___u:986: yājñavalkyeti hovāca -- yad idaṃ sarvam ahorātrābhyām āptaṃ sarvam ahorātrābhyām abhipannaṃ kena yajamāno 'horātrayor āptim atimucyata iti /
GV05brup___u:989: tad yad idaṃ cakṣuḥ so 'sāv ādityaḥ /
GV05brup___u:991: yājñavalkyeti hovāca -- yad idaṃ sarvaṃ pūrvapakṣāparapakṣābhyām āptaṃ sarvaṃ pūrvapakṣāparapakṣābhyām abhipannaṃ kena yajamānaḥ pūrvapakṣāparapakṣayor āptim atimucyata iti /
GV05brup___u:994: tad yo 'yaṃ prāṇaḥ sa vāyuḥ sa udgātā /

GV05brup___u:1001: yājñavalkyeti hovāca -- katibhir ayam adyargbhir hotāsmin yajñe kariṣyatīti /
GV05brup___u:1004: puronuvākyā ca yājyā ca śasyaiva tṛtīyā /
GV05brup___u:1007: yājñavalkyeti hovāca -- katy ayam adyādhvaryur asmin yajña āhutīr hoṣyatīti /
GV05brup___u:1010: yā hutā ujjvalanti yā hutā atinedanti yā hutā adhiśerate /

GV05brup___u:1014: yā hutā atinedante pitṛlokam eva tābhir jayati /

GV05brup___u:1078: ādityaṃ manaś candraṃ diśaḥ śrotraṃ pṛthivīṃ śarīram ākāśam ātmauṣadhīr lomāni vanaspatīn
GV05brup___u:1079: keśā apsu lohitaṃ ca retaś ca nidhīyate kvāyaṃ tadā puruṣo bhavatīti /

GV05brup___u:1083: tau ha yad ūcatuḥ karma haiva tad ūcatuḥ /

GV05brup___u:1085: puṇyo vai puṇyena karmaṇā bhavati pāpaḥ pāpeneti /

GV05brup___u:1087: atha hainaṃ bhujyur lāhyāyaniḥ papraccha -- yājñavalkyeti hovāca -- madreṣu carakāḥ paryavrajāma /
GV05brup___u:1093: athainam abrūma -- kva pārikṣitā abhavann iti /
GV05brup___u:1098: agacchan vai te tad yatrāśvamedhayājino gacchantīti /
GV05brup___u:1102: tāṃ samantaṃ pṛthivīṃ dvistāvat samudraḥ paryeti /
GV05brup___u:1103: tad yāvatī kṣurasya dhārā yāvad vā makṣikāyāḥ pattraṃ tāvān antareṇākāśaḥ tān aindraḥ suparṇo bhūtvā vāyave prāyacchat /
GV05brup___u:1104: tān vāyur ātmani dhitvā tatrāgamayad yatrāśvamedhayājino 'bhavann iti /
GV05brup___u:1105: evam iva vai sa vāyum eva praśaśaṃsa tasmād vāyur eva vyaṣṭir vāyuḥ samaṣṭiḥ /
GV05brup___u:1106: apa punarmṛtyuṃ jayati ya evaṃ veda /

GV05brup___u:1109: yājñavalkyeti hovāca -- yat sākṣād aparokṣād brahma ya ātmā sarvāntaras taṃ me vyācakṣveti /
GV05brup___u:1111: yaḥ prāṇena prāṇiti sa ta ātmā sarvāntaraḥ /
GV05brup___u:1113: yo vyānena vyaniti sa ta ātmā sarvāntaraḥ /
GV05brup___u:1114: ya udānenodaniti sa ta ātmā sarvāntaraḥ /
GV05brup___u:1116: sa hovācoṣastaś cākrāyaṇaḥ -- yathā vai brūyād asau gaur asāv aśva ity evam evaitad vyapadiṣṭaṃ bhavati /
GV05brup___u:1117: yad eva sākṣād aparokṣād brahma ya ātmā sarvāntaras taṃ me vyācakṣveti /
GV05brup___u:1127: atha hainaṃ kaholaḥ kauṣītakeyaḥ papraccha -- yājñavalkyeti hovāca /
GV05brup___u:1128: yad eva sākṣād aparokṣād brahma ya ātmā sarvāntaras taṃ me vyācakṣveti /
GV05brup___u:1131: yo 'śanāyāpipāse śokaṃ mohaṃ jarāṃ mṛtyum atyeti /
GV05brup___u:1132: etaṃ vai tam ātmānaṃ viditvā brāhmaṇāḥ putraiṣaṇāyāś ca vittaiṣaṇāyāś ca lokaiṣaṇāyāś ca vyutthāyātha bhikṣācaryaṃ caranti /

GV05brup___u:1134: ubhe hy ete eṣaṇe eva bhavataḥ /
GV05brup___u:1135: tasmād brāmaṇaḥ pāṇḍityaṃ nirvidya bālyena tiṣṭhāset /
GV05brup___u:1136: bālyaṃ ca pāṇḍityaṃ ca nirvidyātha muniḥ /
GV05brup___u:1137: amaunaṃ ca maunaṃ ca nirvidyātha brāhmaṇaḥ /
GV05brup___u:1138: sa brāhmaṇaḥ kena syād yena syāt tenedṛśa eva /
GV05brup___u:1140: tato ha kaholaḥ kauṣītakeya upararāma // BrhUp_3,5.1 //
GV05brup___u:1141: atha hainaṃ gārgī vācaknavī papraccha -- yājñavalkyeti hovāca /

GV05brup___u:1154: kasmin nu khalu nakṣatralokā otāś ca protāś ceti /
GV05brup___u:1156: kasmin nu khalu devalokā otāś ca protāś ceti /
GV05brup___u:1158: kasmin nu khalv indralokā otāś ca protāś ceti /
GV05brup___u:1160: kasmin nu khalu prajāpatilokā otāś ca protāś ceti /
GV05brup___u:1162: kasmin nu khalu brahmalokā otāś ca protāś ceti /
GV05brup___u:1167: tato ha gārgī vācaknavy upararāma // BrhUp_3,6.1 //
GV05brup___u:1168: athainam uddālaka āruṇiḥ papraccha -- yājñavalkyeti hovāca /
GV05brup___u:1169: madreṣv avasāma patañcalasya kāpyasya gṛheṣu yajñam adhīyānāḥ /
GV05brup___u:1173: so 'bravīt patañcalaṃ kāpyaṃ yājñikāṃś ca -- vettha nu tvaṃ kāpya tat sūtraṃ yasminn ayaṃ ca lokaḥ paraś ca lokaḥ sarvāṇi ca bhūtāni saṃdṛbdhāni bhavantīti /
GV05brup___u:1174: so 'bravīt patañcalaḥ kāpyo nāhaṃ tad bhagavan vedeti /
GV05brup___u:1176: vettha nu tvaṃ kāpya tam antaryāmiṇaṃ ya imaṃ ca lokaṃ paraṃ ca lokaṃ sarvāṇi ca bhūtāny antaro yamayati /
GV05brup___u:1177: so 'bravīt patañcalaḥ kāpyo nāhaṃ taṃ bhagavan vedeti /
GV05brup___u:1179: yo vai tat kāpya sūtraṃ vidyāt taṃ cāntaryāmiṇam iti sa brahmavit sa lokavit sa devavit sa vedavit sa ātmavit sa sarvavit /
GV05brup___u:1182: tac cet tvaṃ yājñavalkya sūtram avidvāṃs taṃ cāntaryāmiṇaṃ brahmagavīr udajase mūrdhā te vipatiṣyati /
GV05brup___u:1183: veda vā ahaṃ gautama tat sūtraṃ taṃ cāntaryāmiṇam iti /
GV05brup___u:1184: yo vā idaṃ kaśca brūyād veda vedeti yathā vettha tathā brūhīti // BrhUp_3,7.1 //
GV05brup___u:1185: sa hovaca -- vāyur vai gautama tat sūtram /
GV05brup___u:1186: vāyunā vai gautama sūtreṇāyaṃ ca lokaḥ paraś ca lokaḥ sarvāṇi ca bhūtāni saṃdṛbdhāni bhavanti /
GV05brup___u:1187: tasmād vai gautama puruṣaṃ pretam āhur vyasraṃsiṣatāsyāṅgānīti /
GV05brup___u:1188: vāyunā hi gautama sūtreṇa samdṛbdhāni bhavantīti /
GV05brup___u:1191: yaḥ pṛthivyāṃ tiṣṭhan pṛthivyā antaro yaṃ pṛthivī na veda yasya pṛthivī śarīraṃ yaḥ pṛthivīm antaro yamayaty eṣa ta ātmāntaryāmy amṛtaḥ // BrhUp_3,7.3
GV05brup___u:1192: yo 'psu tiṣṭhann adbhyo 'ntaro yam āpo na vidur yasyāpaḥ śarīraṃ yo 'po 'ntaro yamayaty eṣa ta ātmāntaryāmy amṛtaḥ // BrhUp_3,7.4 //
GV05brup___u:1193: yo 'gnau tiṣṭhann agner antaro yam agnir na veda yasyāgniḥ śarīraṃ yo 'gnim antaro yamayaty eṣa ta ātmāntaryāmy amṛtaḥ // BrhUp_3,7.5 //
GV05brup___u:1194: yo 'ntarikṣe tiṣṭhann antarikṣād antaro yam antarikṣaṃ na veda yasyāntarikṣaṃ śarīraṃ yo 'ntarikṣam antaro yamayaty eṣa ta ātmāntaryāmy amṛtaḥ
GV05brup___u:1195: yo vāyau tiṣṭhan vāyor antaro yaṃ vāyur na veda yasya vāyuḥ śarīraṃ yo vāyum antaro yamayaty eṣa ta ātmāntaryāmy amṛtaḥ // BrhUp_3,7.7 //
GV05brup___u:1196: yo divi tiṣṭhan divo 'ntaro yaṃ dyaur na veda yasya dyauḥ śarīraṃ yo divam antaro yamayaty eṣa ta ātmāntaryāmy amṛtaḥ // BrhUp_3,7.8 //
GV05brup___u:1197: ya āditye tiṣṭhann ādityād antaro yam ādityo na veda yasyādityaḥ śarīraṃ ya ādityam antaro yamayaty eṣa ta ātmāntaryāmy amṛtaḥ // BrhUp_3,7.9
GV05brup___u:1198: yo dikṣu tiṣṭhan digbhyo 'ntaro yaṃ diśo na vidur yasya diśaḥ śarīraṃ yo diśo 'ntaro yamayaty eṣa ta ātmāntaryāmy amṛtaḥ // BrhUp_3,7.10 //
GV05brup___u:1199: yaś candratārake tiṣṭhañ candratārakād antaro yaṃ candratārakaṃ na veda yasya candratārakaṃ śarīraṃ yaś candratārakam antaro yamayaty eṣa ta ātmāntaryāmy amṛtaḥ // BrhUp_3,7.11 //
GV05brup___u:1200: ya ākāśe tiṣṭhann ākāśād antaro yam ākāśo na veda yasyākāśaḥ śarīraṃ ya ākāśam antaro yamayaty eṣa ta ātmāntaryāmy amṛtaḥ // BrhUp_3,7.12 //
GV05brup___u:1201: yas tamasi tiṣṭhaṃs tamaso 'ntaro yaṃ tamo na veda yasya tamaḥ śarīraṃ yas tamo 'ntaro yamayaty eṣa ta ātmāntaryāmy amṛtaḥ // BrhUp_3,7.13 //
GV05brup___u:1202: yas tejasi tiṣṭhaṃs tejaso 'ntaro yaṃ tejo na veda yasya tejaḥ śarīraṃ yas tejo 'ntaro yamayaty eṣa ta ātmāntaryāmy amṛtaḥ // BrhUp_3,7.14 //
GV05brup___u:1204: yaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu tiṣṭhan sarvebhyo bhūtebhyo 'ntaro yaṃ sarvāṇi bhūtāni na vidur yasya sarvāṇi bhutāni śarīraṃ yaḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāny antaro yamayaty eṣa ta ātmāntaryāmy amṛtaḥ /
GV05brup___u:1207: yaḥ prāṇe tiṣṭhan prāṇād antaro yaṃ prāṇo na veda yasya prāṇaḥ śarīraṃ yaḥ prāṇam antaro yamayati eṣa ta ātmāntaryāmy amṛtaḥ // BrhUp_3,7.16
GV05brup___u:1208: yo vāci tiṣṭhan vāco 'ntaro yaṃ vāṅ na veda yasya vāk śarīraṃ yo vācam antaro yamayaty eṣa ta ātmāntaryāmy amṛtaḥ // BrhUp_3,7.17 //
GV05brup___u:1209: yaś cakṣuṣi tiṣṭhañ cakṣuṣo 'ntaro yaṃ cakṣur na veda yasya cakṣuḥ śarīraṃ yaś cakṣur antaro yamayaty eṣa ta ātmāntaryāmy amṛtaḥ // BrhUp_3,7.18
GV05brup___u:1210: yaḥ śrotre tiṣṭhañ chrotrād antaro yaṃ śrotraṃ na veda yasya śrotraṃ śarīraṃ yaḥ śrotram antaro yamayaty eṣa ta ātmāntaryāmy amṛtaḥ // BrhUp_3,7.19
GV05brup___u:1211: yo manasi tiṣṭhan manaso 'ntaro yaṃ mano na veda yasya manaḥ śarīraṃ yo mano 'ntaro yamayaty eṣa ta ātmāntaryāmy amṛtaḥ // BrhUp_3,7.20 //
GV05brup___u:1212: yas tvaci tiṣṭhaṃs tvaco 'ntaro yaṃ tvaṅ na veda yasya tvak śarīraṃ yas tvacam antaro yamayaty eṣa ta ātmāntaryāmy amṛtaḥ // BrhUp_3,7.21 //
GV05brup___u:1213: yo vijñāne tiṣṭhan vijñānād antaro yaṃ vijñānaṃ na veda yasya vijñānaṃ śarīraṃ yo vijñānam antaro yamayaty eṣa ta ātmāntaryāmy amṛtaḥ // BrhUp_3,7.22
GV05brup___u:1214: yo retasi tiṣṭhaṃ retaso 'ntaro yaṃ reto na veda yasya retaḥ śarīraṃ yo reto 'ntaro yamayaty eṣa ta ātmāntaryāmy amṛtaḥ /
GV05brup___u:1216: nānyo 'to 'sti draṣṭā nānyo 'to 'sti śrotā nānyo 'to 'sti mantā nānyo 'to 'sti vijñātā /
GV05brup___u:1220: atha ha vācaknavy uvāca -- brāhmaṇā bhagavanto hantāham imaṃ dvau praśnau prakṣyāmi /
GV05brup___u:1222: na vai jātu yuṣmākam imaṃ kaścid brahmodyaṃ jeteti /
GV05brup___u:1224: sā hovāca -- ahaṃ vai tvā yājñavalkya yathā kāśyo vā vaideho vograputra ujjyaṃ dhanur
GV05brup___u:1225: adhijyaṃ kṛtvā dvau bāṇavantau sapatnātivyādhinau haste kṛtvopottiṣṭhed evam evāhaṃ
GV05brup___u:1229: sā hovāca -- yad ūrdhvaṃ yājñavalkya divo yad avāk pṛthivyā yad antarā dyāvāpṛthivī
GV05brup___u:1230: ime yad bhūtaṃ ca bhavac ca bhaviṣyac cety ācakṣate kasmiṃs tad otaṃ ca protaṃ ceti // BrhUp_3,8.3 //
GV05brup___u:1231: sa hovāca -- yad ūrdhvaṃ gārgi divo yad avāk pṛthivyā yad antarā dyāvāpṛthivī ime yad bhūtaṃ ca bhavac ca bhaviṣyac cety ācakṣata ākāśe tad otaṃ ca protaṃ ceti // BrhUp_3,8.4 //
GV05brup___u:1232: sā hovaca -- namas te 'stu yājñavalkya yo ma etaṃ vyavoco 'parasmai dhārayasveti pṛccha gārgīti // BrhUp_3,8.5 //
GV05brup___u:1233: sā hovāca -- yad ūrdhvaṃ yājñavalkya divo yad avāk pṛthivyā yad antarā dyāvāpṛthivī
GV05brup___u:1234: ime yad bhūtaṃ ca bhavac ca bhaviṣyac cety ācakṣate kasmiṃs tad otaṃ ca protaṃ ceti // BrhUp_3,8.6 //
GV05brup___u:1235: sa hovāca -- yad ūrdhvaṃ gārgi divo yad avāk pṛthivyā yad antarā dyāvāpṛthivī ime yad bhūtaṃ ca bhavac ca bhaviṣyac cety ācakṣata ākāśa eva tad otaṃ ca protaṃ ceti /
GV05brup___u:1236: kasmin nu khalv ākāśa otaś ca protaś ceti // BrhUp_3,8.7 //
GV05brup___u:1237: sa hovāca -- etad vai tad akṣaraṃ gārgi brāhmaṇā abhivadanty asthūlam anaṇv ahrasvam
GV05brup___u:1238: adīrgham alohitam asneham acchāyam atamo 'vāyv anākāśam asaṅgam arasam agandham acakṣuṣkam
GV05brup___u:1239: aśrotram avāg amano 'tejaskam aprāṇam amukham agātram anantaram abāhyam (VAR for agātram: amātram) /
GV05brup___u:1241: na tad aśnāti kaś cana // BrhUp_3,8.8 //
GV05brup___u:1242: etasya vā akṣarasya praśāsane gārgi sūryacandramasau vidhṛtau tiṣṭhataḥ /
GV05brup___u:1243: etasya vā akṣarasya praśāsane gārgi dyāvāpṛthivyau vidhṛte tiṣṭhataḥ /
GV05brup___u:1244: etasya vā akṣarasya praśāsane gārgi nimeṣā muhūrtā ahorātrāṇy ardhamāsā māsā ṛtavaḥ saṃvatsarā iti vidhṛtās tiṣṭhanti /
GV05brup___u:1245: etasya vā akṣarasya praśāsane gārgi prācyo 'nyā nadyaḥ syandante śvetebhyaḥ parvatebhyaḥ pratīcyo 'nyā yāṃ yāṃ ca diśam anu /
GV05brup___u:1246: etasya vā akṣarasya praśāsane gārgi manuṣyāḥ praśasanti yajamānaṃ devā darvīṃ pitaro 'nvāyattāḥ //
GV05brup___u:1248: yo vā etad akṣaram gārgy aviditvāsmiṃl loke juhoti yajate tapas tapyate bahūni varṣasahasrāṇy antavad evāsya tad bhavati
GV05brup___u:1249: yo vā etad akṣaram aviditvā gārgy aviditvāsmāl lokāt praiti sa kṛpaṇaḥ /
GV05brup___u:1250: atha ya etad akṣaraṃ gārgi viditvāsmāl lokāt praiti sa brāhmaṇaḥ // BrhUp_3,8.10 //
GV05brup___u:1251: tad vā etad akṣaraṃ gārgy adṛṣṭaṃ draṣṭraśrutaṃ śrotramataṃ mantravijñātaṃ vijñātṛ /
GV05brup___u:1256: etasmin nu khalv akṣare gārgy ākāśa otaś ca protaś ca // BrhUp_3,8.11 //
GV05brup___u:1257: sā hovāca -- brāhmaṇā bhagavantas tad eva bahu manyadhvaṃ yad asmān namaskāreṇa mucyedhvam /
GV05brup___u:1258: na vai jātu yuṣmākam imaṃ kaścid brahmodyaṃ jeteti /
GV05brup___u:1260: atha hainaṃ vidagdhaḥ śākalyaḥ papraccha -- kati devā yājñavalkyeti /
GV05brup___u:1261: sa haitayaiva nividā pratipede yāvanto vaiśvadevasya nividy ucyante /
GV05brup___u:1262: trayaś ca trī ca śatā trayaś ca trī ca sahasreti /
GV05brup___u:1282: katame te trayaś ca trī ca śatā trayaś ca trī ca sahasreti // BrhUp_3,9.1 //
GV05brup___u:1286: aṣṭau vasava ekādaśa rudrā dvādaśādityāḥ ta ekatriṃśad aindraś caiva prajāpatiś ca trayastriṃśāv iti // BrhUp_3,9.2 //
GV05brup___u:1288: agniś ca pṛthivī ca vāyuś cāntarikṣaṃ cādityaś ca dyauḥ ca candramāś ca nakṣatrāṇi caite vasavaḥ /
GV05brup___u:1289: eteṣu hīdaṃ sarvaṃ vasu hitaṃ iti tasmād vasava iti // BrhUp_3,9.3 //
GV05brup___u:1292: te yadāsmāc charīrān martyād utkrāmanty atha rodayanti /
GV05brup___u:1293: tad yad rodayanti tasmād rudrā iti // BrhUp_3,9.4 //
GV05brup___u:1297: te yad idaṃ sarvam ādadānā yanti tasmād ādityā iti // BrhUp_3,9.5 //
GV05brup___u:1305: agniś ca pṛthivī ca vāyuś cāntarikṣaś cādityaś ca dyauś caite ṣaṭ /
GV05brup___u:1306: ete hīdaṃ sarvaṃ ṣaḍ iti // BrhUp_3,9.7 //
GV05brup___u:1314: tad āhur yad ayam eka ivaiva pavate /
GV05brup___u:1316: yad asminn idaṃ sarvam adhyārdhnot tenādhyardha iti /
GV05brup___u:1319: sa brahma tyad ity ācakṣate // BrhUp_3,9.9 //
GV05brup___u:1320: pṛthivy eva yasyāyatanam agnir loko mano jyotir yo vai taṃ puruṣaṃ vidyāt sarvasyātmanaḥ parāyaṇaṃ sa vai veditā syāt /
GV05brup___u:1321: yājñavalkya veda vā ahaṃ taṃ puruṣaṃ sarvasyātmanaḥ parāyaṇaṃ yam āttha /
GV05brup___u:1322: ya evāyaṃ śārīraḥ puruṣaḥ sa eṣaḥ /
GV05brup___u:1325: kāma eva yasyāyatanaṃ hṛdayaṃ loko mano jyotir yo vai taṃ puruṣaṃ vidyāt sarvasyātmanaḥ parāyaṇaṃ sa vai veditā syāt /
GV05brup___u:1326: yājñavalkya veda vā ahaṃ taṃ puruṣaṃ sarvasyātmanaḥ parāyaṇaṃ yam āttha /
GV05brup___u:1327: ya evāyaṃ kāmamayaḥ puruṣaḥ sa eṣaḥ /
GV05brup___u:1330: rūpāṇy eva yasyāyatanaṃ cakṣur loko mano jyotir yo vai taṃ puruṣaṃ vidyāt sarvasyātmanaḥ parāyaṇaṃ sa vai veditā syāt /
GV05brup___u:1331: yājñavalkya veda vā ahaṃ taṃ puruṣaṃ sarvasyātmanaḥ parāyaṇaṃ yam āttha /
GV05brup___u:1332: ya evāsāv āditye puruṣaḥ sa eṣaḥ /
GV05brup___u:1335: ākaśa eva yasyāyatanaṃ śrotraṃ loko mano jyotir yo vai taṃ puruṣaṃ vidyāt sarvasyātmanaḥ parāyaṇaṃ sa vai veditā syāt /
GV05brup___u:1336: yājñavalkya veda vā ahaṃ taṃ puruṣaṃ sarvasyātmanaḥ parāyaṇaṃ yam āttha /
GV05brup___u:1337: ya evāyam śrautaḥ prātiśrutkaḥ puruṣaḥ sa eṣa /
GV05brup___u:1340: tama eva yasyāyatanaṃ hṛdayaṃ loko mano jyotir yo vai taṃ puruṣaṃ vidyāt sarvasyātmanaḥ parāyaṇaṃ sa vai veditā syāt /
GV05brup___u:1341: yājñavalkya veda vā ahaṃ taṃ puruṣaṃ sarvasyātmanaḥ parāyaṇaṃ yam āttha /
GV05brup___u:1342: ya evāyaṃ chāyāmayaḥ puruṣaḥ sa eṣaḥ /
GV05brup___u:1345: rūpāṇy eva yasyāyatanaṃ hṛdayaṃ loko mano jyotir yo vai taṃ puruṣaṃ vidyāt sarvasyātmanaḥ parāyaṇaṃ sa vai veditā syāt /
GV05brup___u:1346: yājñavalkya veda vā ahaṃ taṃ puruṣaṃ sarvasyātmanaḥ parāyaṇaṃ yam āttha /
GV05brup___u:1347: ya evāyam ādarśe puruṣaḥ sa eṣaḥ /
GV05brup___u:1350: āpa eva yasyāyatanaṃ hṛdayaṃ loko mano jyotir yo vai taṃ puruṣaṃ vidyāt sarvasyātmanaḥ parāyaṇaṃ sa vai veditā syāt /
GV05brup___u:1351: yājñavalkya veda vā ahaṃ taṃ puruṣaṃ sarvasyātmanaḥ parāyaṇaṃ yam āttha /
GV05brup___u:1352: ya evāyaṃ apsu puruṣaḥ sa eṣaḥ /
GV05brup___u:1355: reta eva yasyāyatanaṃ hṛdayaṃ loko mano jyotir yo vai taṃ puruṣaṃ vidyāt sarvasyātmanaḥ parāyaṇaṃ sa vai veditā syāt /
GV05brup___u:1356: yājñavalkya veda vā ahaṃ taṃ puruṣaṃ sarvasyātmanaḥ parāyaṇaṃ yam āttha /
GV05brup___u:1357: ya evāyaṃ putramayaḥ puruṣaḥ sa eṣaḥ /
GV05brup___u:1361: tvāṃ svid ime brāhmaṇā aṅgārāvakṣayaṇam akratā3 iti // BrhUp_3,9.18 //
GV05brup___u:1363: yad idaṃ kurupañcālānāṃ brāhmanān atyavādīḥ kiṃ brahma vidvān iti /
GV05brup___u:1365: yad diśo vettha sadevāḥ sapratiṣṭhāḥ // BrhUp_3,9.19 //
GV05brup___u:1376: hṛdaye hy eva rūpāṇi pratiṣṭhitāni bhavantīti /
GV05brup___u:1386: yadā hy eva śraddhatte 'tha dakṣiṇāṃ dadāti /
GV05brup___u:1391: hṛdaye hy eva śraddhā pratiṣṭhitā bhavatīti /
GV05brup___u:1401: tasmād api pratirūpaṃ jātam āhur hṛdayād iva sṛpto hṛdayād iva nirmita iti /
GV05brup___u:1402: hṛdaye hy eva retaḥ pratiṣṭhitaṃ bhavatīti /
GV05brup___u:1410: tasmād api dīkṣitam āhuḥ satyaṃ vadeti /
GV05brup___u:1415: hṛdaye hy eva satyaṃ pratiṣṭhitaṃ bhavatīti /
GV05brup___u:1423: kasmin nu hṛdayaṃ pratiṣṭhitam iti // BrhUp_3,9.24 //
GV05brup___u:1426: yad dhy etad anyatrāsmat syāc chvāno vainad adyur vayāṃsi vainad vimathnīrann iti // BrhUp_3,9.25 //
GV05brup___u:1427: kasmin nu tvaṃ cātmā ca pratiṣṭhitau stha iti /
GV05brup___u:1443: etāny aṣṭāv āyatanāny aṣṭau lokā add. aṣṭau devā aṣṭau puruṣāḥ /
GV05brup___u:1444: sa yas tān puruṣān niruhya pratyuhyātyakrāmat taṃ tvaupaniṣadaṃ puruṣaṃ pṛcchāmi /
GV05brup___u:1445: taṃ cen me na vivakṣyasi mūrdhā te vipatiṣyatīti /
GV05brup___u:1448: api hāsya parimoṣiṇo 'sthīny apajahrur anyan manyamānāḥ // BrhUp_3,9.26 //
GV05brup___u:1449: atha hovāca -- brāhmaṇā bhagavanto yo vaḥ kāmayate sa mā pṛcchatu /
GV05brup___u:1451: yo vaḥ kāmayate taṃ vaḥ pṛcchāmi sarvān vā vaḥ pṛcchāmīti /
GV05brup___u:1452: te ha brāhmaṇā na dadhṛṣuḥ // BrhUp_3,9.27 //
GV05brup___u:1455: tasya lomāni parṇāni tvag asyotpāṭikā bahiḥ // BrhUp_3,9.28:1 //
GV05brup___u:1456: tvaca evāsya rudhiraṃ prasyandi tvaca utpaṭaḥ /
GV05brup___u:1457: tasmāt tad ātṛṇṇāt praiti raso vṛkṣād ivāhatāt // BrhUp_3,9.28:2 //
GV05brup___u:1458: māṃsāny asya śakarāṇi kināṭaṃ snāva tat sthiram /
GV05brup___u:1459: asthīny antarato dāruṇi majjā majjopamā kṛtā // BrhUp_3,9.28:3 //
GV05brup___u:1460: yad vṛkṣo vṛkṇo rohati mūlān navataraḥ punaḥ /
GV05brup___u:1461: martyaḥ svin mṛtyunā vṛkṇaḥ kasmān mūlāt prarohati // BrhUp_3,9.28:4 //
GV05brup___u:1462: retasa iti mā vocata jīvatas tat prajāyate /
GV05brup___u:1463: dhānāruha iva vai vṛkṣo 'ñjasā pretya sambhavaḥ // BrhUp_3,9.28:5 //
GV05brup___u:1464: yat samūlam āvṛheyur vṛkṣaṃ na punar ābhavet /
GV05brup___u:1465: martyaḥ svin mṛtyunā vṛkṇaḥ kasmān mūlāt prarohati // BrhUp_3,9.28:6 //
GV05brup___u:1466: jāta eva na jāyate ko nv enaṃ janayet punaḥ /
GV05brup___u:1467: vijñānam ānandaṃ brahma rātir dātuḥ parāyaṇam // BrhUp_3,9.28:7 //
GV05brup___u:1468: jāta eva na jāyate ko nv enaṃ janayet punaḥ /
GV05brup___u:1469: vijñānam ānandaṃ brahma rātir dātuḥ parāyaṇam //
GV05brup___u:1473: taṃ hovāca -- yājñavalkya kim artham acārīḥ paśūn icchan aṇvantānīti /
GV05brup___u:1474: ubhayam eva saṃrāḍ iti hovāca // BrhUp_4,1.1 //
GV05brup___u:1475: yat te kaścid abravīt tac chṛṇavāmeti /
GV05brup___u:1476: abravīn me jitvā śailiniḥ -- vāg vai brahmeti /
GV05brup___u:1477: yathā mātṛmān pitṛmān ācāryavān brūyāt tathā tac chailinir abravīd vāg vai brahmeti /
GV05brup___u:1483: vāg evāyatanam ākāśaḥ pratiṣṭhā prajñety enad upāsīta /
GV05brup___u:1487: ṛgvedo yajurvedaḥ sāmavedo 'tharvāṅgirasa itihāsaḥ purāṇaṃ vidyā upaniṣadaḥ ślokāḥ
GV05brup___u:1488: sūtrāṇy anuvyākhyānāni vyākhyānānīṣṭaṃ hutam āśitaṃ pāyitam ayaṃ ca lokaḥ paraś ca
GV05brup___u:1489: lokaḥ sarvāṇi ca bhūtāni vācaiva saṃrāṭ prajñāyante /
GV05brup___u:1495: hastyṛṣabhaṃ sahasraṃ dadāmīti hovāca janako vaidehaḥ /
GV05brup___u:1496: sa hovāca yājñavalkyaḥ -- pitā me 'manyata nānanuśiṣya hareteti // BrhUp_4,1.2 //
GV05brup___u:1497: yad eva te kaścid abravīt tac chṛṇavāmeti /
GV05brup___u:1500: yathā mātṛmān pitṛmān ācāryavān brūyāt tathā tac chaulbāyano 'bravīt prāṇo vai brahmeti /
GV05brup___u:1512: api tatra vadhāśaṅkā bhavati yāṃ diśam eti prāṇasyaiva samrāṭ kāmāya /
GV05brup___u:1518: hastyṛṣabhaṃ sahasraṃ dadāmīti hovāca janako vaidehah /
GV05brup___u:1519: sa hovāca yājñavalkyaḥ -- pitā me 'manyata nānanuśiṣya hareteti // BrhUp_4,1.3 //
GV05brup___u:1520: yad eva te kaścid abravīt tac chṛṇavāmeti /
GV05brup___u:1523: yathā mātṛmān pitṛmān ācāryavān brūyāt tathā tad vārṣṇo 'bravīc cakṣur vai brahmeti /
GV05brup___u:1533: cakṣuṣā vai samrāṭ paśyantam āhur adrākṣīr iti /
GV05brup___u:1534: sa āhādrākṣam iti tat satyaṃ bhavati /
GV05brup___u:1540: hastyṛṣabhaṃ sahasraṃ dadāmīti hovāca janako vaidehaḥ /
GV05brup___u:1541: sa hovāca yājñavalkyaḥ -- pitā me 'manyata nānanuśiṣya hareteti // BrhUp_4,1.4 //
GV05brup___u:1542: yad eva te kaścid abravīt tac chṛṇavāmeti /
GV05brup___u:1545: yathā mātṛmān pitṛmān ācāryavān brūyāt tathā tad bhāradvājo 'bravīc chrotraṃ vai brahmeti /
GV05brup___u:1551: śrotram evāyatanam ākāśaḥ pratiṣṭhānantam ity enad upāsīta /
GV05brup___u:1554: tasmād vai samrāḍ api yāṃ kāñca diśaṃ gacchati naivāsyā antaṃ gacchati /
GV05brup___u:1562: hastyṛṣabhaṃ sahasraṃ dadāmīti hovāca janako vaidehaḥ /
GV05brup___u:1563: sa hovāca yājñavalkyaḥ -- pitā me 'manyata nānanuśiṣya hareteti // BrhUp_4,1.5 //
GV05brup___u:1564: yad eva te kaścid abravīt tac chṛṇavāmeti /
GV05brup___u:1565: abravīn me satyakāmo jābālaḥ -- mano vai brahmeti /
GV05brup___u:1566: yathā mātṛmān pitṛmān ācāryavān brūyāt tathā taj jābālo 'bravīn mano vai brahmeti /
GV05brup___u:1572: mana evāyatanam ākāśaḥ pratiṣṭhānanda ity enad upāsīta /
GV05brup___u:1574: mana eva samrāḍ iti hovāca manasā vai samrāṭ striyam abhi hāryati tasyāṃ pratirūpaḥ putro jāyate /
GV05brup___u:1581: hastyṛṣabhaṃ sahasraṃ dadāmīti hovāca janako vaidehaḥ /
GV05brup___u:1582: sa hovāca yājñavalkyaḥ -- pitā me 'manyata nānanuśiṣya hareteti // BrhUp_4,1.6 //
GV05brup___u:1583: yad eva te kaścid abravīt tac chṛṇavāmeti /
GV05brup___u:1586: yathā mātṛmān pitṛmān ācāryavān brūyāt tathā tac chākalyo 'bravīd dhṛdayaṃ vai brahmeti /
GV05brup___u:1596: hṛdayaṃ vai samrāṭ sarveṣāṃ bhūtānām āyatanam /
GV05brup___u:1597: hṛdayaṃ vai samrāṭ sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ pratiṣṭhā /
GV05brup___u:1598: hṛdaye hy eva samrāṭ sarvāṇi bhūtāni pratiṣṭhitāni bhavanti /
GV05brup___u:1604: hastyṛṣabhaṃ sahasraṃ dadāmīti hovāca janako vaidehaḥ /
GV05brup___u:1605: sa hovāca yājñavalkyaḥ -- pitā me 'manyata nānanuśiṣya hareteti // BrhUp_4,1.7 //
GV05brup___u:1606: janako ha vaidehaḥ kūrcād upāvasarpann uvāca -- namas te 'stu yājñavalkya /
GV05brup___u:1608: sa hovāca yathā vai samrāṇ mahāntam adhvānam eṣyan rathaṃ vā nāvaṃ vā samādadītaivam evaitābhir upaniṣadbhiḥ samāhitātmāsi /
GV05brup___u:1609: evaṃ vṛndāraka āḍhyaḥ sann adhītaveda uktopaniṣatka ito vimucyamānaḥ kva gamiṣyasīti /
GV05brup___u:1610: nāhaṃ tad bhagavan veda yatra gamiṣyāmīti /
GV05brup___u:1611: atha vai te 'haṃ tad vakṣyāmi yatra gamiṣyasīti /
GV05brup___u:1613: indho ha vai nāmaiṣa yo 'yaṃ dakṣiṇe 'kṣan puruṣaḥ /
GV05brup___u:1614: taṃ vā etam indhaṃ santam indra ity ācakṣate parokṣeṇaiva /
GV05brup___u:1615: parokṣapriyā iva hi devāḥ pratyakṣadviṣaḥ // BrhUp_4,2.2 //
GV05brup___u:1616: athaitad vāme 'kṣaṇi puruṣarūpam eṣāsya patnī virāṭ /
GV05brup___u:1617: tayor eṣa saṃstāvo ya eṣo 'ntar hṛdaya ākāśaḥ /
GV05brup___u:1618: athainayor etad annaṃ ya eṣo 'ntar hṛdaye lohitapiṇḍaḥ /
GV05brup___u:1619: athainayor etat prāvaraṇaṃ yad etad antar hṛdaye jālakam iva /
GV05brup___u:1620: athainayor eṣā sṛtiḥ saṃcaraṇī yaiṣā hṛdayād ūrdhvā nāḍy uccarati /
GV05brup___u:1621: yathā keśaḥ sahasradhā bhinna evam asyaitā hitā nāma nāḍyo 'ntar hṛdaye pratiṣṭhitā bhavanti /
GV05brup___u:1623: tasmād eṣa praviviktāhāratara iva bhavaty asmāc chārīrād ātmanaḥ // BrhUp_4,2.3 //
GV05brup___u:1637: abhayaṃ vai janaka prāpto 'sīti hovāca yājñavalkyaḥ /
GV05brup___u:1638: sa hovāca janako vaideho 'bhayaṃ tvā gacchatād yājñavalkya yo no bhagavann abhayaṃ vedayase /
GV05brup___u:1640: ime videhā ayam aham asmīti // BrhUp_4,2.4 //
GV05brup___u:1643: atha ha yaj janakaś ca vaideho yājñavalkyaś cāgnihotre samūdāte /
GV05brup___u:1647: taṃ ha samrāḍ eva pūrvaḥ papraccha // BrhUp_4,3.1 //
GV05brup___u:1650: ādityenaivāyaṃ jyotiṣāste palyayate karma kurute vipalyetīti /
GV05brup___u:1652: astamita āditye yājñavalkya kiṃjyotir evāyaṃ puruṣa iti /
GV05brup___u:1654: candramasaivāyaṃ jyotiṣāste palyayate karma kurute vipalyetīti /
GV05brup___u:1656: astamita āditye yājñavalkya candramasy astamite kiṃjyotir evāyaṃ puruṣa iti /
GV05brup___u:1658: agninaiva jyotiṣāste palyayate karma kurute vipalyetīti /
GV05brup___u:1660: astamita āditye yājñavalkya candramasy astamite śānte 'gnau kiṃjyotir evāyaṃ puruṣa iti /
GV05brup___u:1662: vācaivāyaṃ jyotiṣāste palyayate karma kurute vipalyeti /
GV05brup___u:1663: tasmād vai samrāḍ api yatra svaḥ pāṇir na vinirjñāyate 'tha yatra vāg uccaraty upaiva tatra nyetīti /
GV05brup___u:1665: astamita āditye yājñavalkya candramasy astamite śānte 'gnau śāntāyāṃ vāci kiṃjyotir evāyaṃ puruṣa iti /
GV05brup___u:1667: ātmanaivāyaṃ jyotiṣāste palyayate karma kurute vipalyetīti // BrhUp_4,3.6 //
GV05brup___u:1668: katama ātmeti -- yo 'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ prāṇeṣu hṛdy antarjyotiḥ puruṣaḥ /
GV05brup___u:1669: sa samānaḥ sann ubhau lokāv anusaṃcarati dhyāyatīva lelāyatīva /
GV05brup___u:1670: sa hi svapno bhūtvemaṃ lokam atikrāmati add. mṛtyo rūpāṇi // BrhUp_4,3.7 //
GV05brup___u:1671: sa vā ayaṃ puruṣo jāyamānaḥ śarīram abhisampadyamānaḥ pāpmabhiḥ saṃsṛjyate /
GV05brup___u:1672: sa utkrāman mriyamāṇaḥ pāpmano vijahāti // BrhUp_4,3.8 //
GV05brup___u:1673: tasya vā etasya puruṣasya dve eva sthāne bhavataḥ /
GV05brup___u:1676: tasminsandhye sthāne tiṣṭhan ubhe sthāne paśyatīdaṃ ca paralokasthānaṃ ca /
GV05brup___u:1678: tam ākramam ākramyobhayān pāpmana ānandāṃś ca paśyati /
GV05brup___u:1679: sa yatra prasvapity asya lokasya sarvāvato mātrām apādāya svayaṃ vihatya svayaṃ nirmāya svena bhāsā svena jyotiṣā prasvapiti /
GV05brup___u:1681: na tatra rathā na rathayogā na panthāno bhavanti /
GV05brup___u:1685: na tatra veśāntāḥ puṣkariṇyaḥ sravantyo bhavanti /
GV05brup___u:1690: śukram ādāya punar aiti sthānaṃ hiraṇmayaḥpuruṣa ekahaṃsaḥ // BrhUp_4,3.11 //
GV05brup___u:1691: prāṇena rakṣann avaraṃ kulāyaṃ bahiṣkulāyād amṛtaś caritvā /
GV05brup___u:1692: sa īyate 'mṛto yatrakāmaṃ hiraṇmayaḥ puruṣa ekahaṃsaḥ // BrhUp_4,3.12 //
GV05brup___u:1693: svapnānta uccāvacam īyamāno rūpāṇi devaḥ kurute bahūni /
GV05brup___u:1694: uteva strībhiḥ saha modamāno jakṣad utevāpi bhayāni paśyan // BrhUp_4,3.13 //
GV05brup___u:1695: ārāmam asya paśyanti na taṃ paśyati kaś caneti /
GV05brup___u:1697: durbhiṣajyaṃ hāsmai bhavati yam eṣa na pratipadyate /
GV05brup___u:1698: atho khalv āhur jāgaritadeśa evāsyaisa iti /
GV05brup___u:1699: yāni hy eva jāgrat paśyati tāni supta iti /
GV05brup___u:1703: sa vā eṣa etasmin saṃprasāde ratvā caritvā dṛṣṭvaiva puṇyaṃ ca pāpaṃ ca punaḥ pratinyāyaṃ pratiyony ādravati svapnāyaiva /
GV05brup___u:1704: sa yat tatra kiñcit paśyaty ananvāgatas tena bhavati /
GV05brup___u:1709: sa vā eṣa etasmin svapne ratvā caritvā dṛṣṭvaiva puṇyaṃ ca pāpaṃ ca punaḥ pratinyāyaṃ pratiyony ādravati buddhāntāyaiva /
GV05brup___u:1710: sa yat tatra kiñcit paśyaty ananvāgatas tena bhavati /
GV05brup___u:1715: sa vā eṣa etasmin buddhānte ratvā caritvā dṛṣṭvaiva puṇyaṃ ca pāpaṃ ca punaḥ pratinyāyaṃ pratiyony ādravati svapnāntāyaiva // BrhUp_4,3.17 //
GV05brup___u:1716: tad yathā mahāmatsya ubhe kūle anusaṃcarati pūrvaṃ cāparaṃ ca /
GV05brup___u:1717: evam evāyaṃ puruṣa etāv ubhāv antāv anusaṃcarati svapnāntaṃ ca buddhāntaṃ ca // BrhUp_4,3.18 //
GV05brup___u:1718: tad yathāsminn ākāśe śyeno vā suparṇo vā viparipatya śrāntaḥ saṃhatya pakṣau saṃlayāyaiva dhriyate /
GV05brup___u:1719: evam evāyaṃ puruṣa etasmā antāya dhavati /
GV05brup___u:1720: yatra supto na kaṃ cana kāmaṃ kāmayate na kaṃ cana svapnaṃ paśyati // BrhUp_4,3.19 //
GV05brup___u:1721: tā vā asyaitā hitā nāma nāḍyo yathā keśaḥ sahasradhā bhinnas tāvatāṇimnā tiṣṭhanti /
GV05brup___u:1722: śuklasya nīlasya piṅgalasya haritasya lohitasya pūrṇāḥ /
GV05brup___u:1723: atha yatrainaṃ ghnantīva jinantīva hastīva vicchāyayati gartam iva patati /
GV05brup___u:1724: yad eva jāgrad bhayaṃ paśyati tad atrāvidyayā manyate /
GV05brup___u:1725: atha yatra deva iva rājevāham evedaṃ sarvo 'smīti manyate /
GV05brup___u:1728: tad yathā priyayā striyā saṃpariṣvakto na bāhyaṃ kiṃ cana veda nāntaram /
GV05brup___u:1729: evam evāyaṃ puruṣaḥ prājñenātmanā saṃpariṣvakto na bāhyaṃ kiṃ cana veda nāntaram /
GV05brup___u:1730: tad vā asyaitad āptakāmam ātmakāmam akāmaṃ rūpam śokāntaram // BrhUp_4,3.21 //
GV05brup___u:1731: atra pitāpitā bhavati mātāmātā lokā alokā devā adevā vedā avedāḥ /
GV05brup___u:1732: atra steno 'steno bhavati bhrūṇahābhrūṇahā cāṇḍyālo 'caṇḍyālaḥ paulkaso 'paulkasaḥ śramaṇo 'śramaṇas tāpaso 'tāpasaḥ /
GV05brup___u:1734: tīrṇo hi tadā sarvāñ śokān hṛdayasya bhavati // BrhUp_4,3.22 //
GV05brup___u:1735: yad vai tan na paśyati paśyan vai tan na paśyati /
GV05brup___u:1736: na hi draṣṭur dṛṣṭer viparilopo vidyate 'vināśitvān /
GV05brup___u:1737: na tu tad dvitīyam asti tato 'nyad vibhaktaṃ yat paśyet // BrhUp_4,3.23 //
GV05brup___u:1738: yad vai tan na jighrati jighran vai tan na jighrati /
GV05brup___u:1739: na hi ghrātur ghrāter viparilopo vidyate 'vināśitvāt /
GV05brup___u:1740: na tu tad dvitīyam asti tato 'nyad vibhaktaṃ yaj jighret // BrhUp_4,3.24 //
GV05brup___u:1741: yad vai tan na rasayati rasayan vai tan na rasayati /
GV05brup___u:1742: na hi rasayitū rasayater viparilopo vidyate 'vināśitvāt /
GV05brup___u:1743: na tu tad dvitīyam asti tato 'nyad vibhaktaṃ yad rasayet // BrhUp_4,3.25 //
GV05brup___u:1744: yad vai tan na vadati vadan vai tan na vadati /
GV05brup___u:1745: na hi vaktur vakter viparilopo vidyate 'vināśitvāt /
GV05brup___u:1746: na tu tad dvitīyam asti tato 'nyad vibhaktaṃ yad vadet // BrhUp_4,3.26 //
GV05brup___u:1747: yad vai tan na śṛṇoti śṛṇvan vai tan na śṛṇoti /
GV05brup___u:1748: na hi śrotuḥ śruter viparilopo vidyate 'vināśitvāt /
GV05brup___u:1749: na tu tad dvitīyam asti tato 'nyad vibhaktaṃ yac chṛṇuyāt // BrhUp_4,3.27 //
GV05brup___u:1750: yad vai tan na manute manvāno vai tan na manute /
GV05brup___u:1751: na hi mantur mater viparilopo vidyate 'vināśitvāt /
GV05brup___u:1752: na tu tad dvitīyam asti tato 'nyad vibhaktaṃ yan manvīta // BrhUp_4,3.28 //
GV05brup___u:1753: yad vai tan na spṛśati spṛśan vai tan na spṛśati /
GV05brup___u:1754: na hi spraṣṭuḥ spṛṣṭer viparilopo vidyate 'vināśitvāt /
GV05brup___u:1755: na tu tad dvitīyam asti tato 'nyad vibhaktaṃ yat spṛśet // BrhUp_4,3.29 //
GV05brup___u:1756: yad vai tan na vijānāti vijānan vai tan na vijānāti /
GV05brup___u:1757: na hi vijñātur vijñāter viparilopo vidyate 'vināśitvāt /
GV05brup___u:1758: na tu tad dvitīyam asti tato 'nyad vibhaktaṃ yad vijānīyāt // BrhUp_4,3.30 //
GV05brup___u:1759: yatra vā anyad iva syāt tatrānyo 'nyat paśyed anyo 'nyaj jighred anyo 'nyad rasayed
GV05brup___u:1760: anyo 'nyad vaded anyo 'nyac chṛṇuyād anyo 'nyan manvītānyo 'nyat spṛśed anyo 'nyad
GV05brup___u:1770: sa yo manūṣyāṇāṃ rāddhaḥ samṛddho bhavaty anyeṣām adhipatiḥ sarvair mānuṣyakair bhogaiḥ sampannatamaḥ sa manuṣyāṇāṃ parama ānandaḥ /
GV05brup___u:1771: atha ye śataṃ manuṣyāṇām ānandāḥ sa ekaḥ pitṝṇāṃ jitalokānām ānandaḥ /
GV05brup___u:1772: atha ye śataṃ pitṝṇāṃ jitalokānām ānandāḥ sa eko gandharvaloka ānandaḥ /
GV05brup___u:1773: atha ye śataṃ gandharvaloka ānandāḥ sa ekaḥ karmadevānām ānando ye karmaṇā devatvam abhisampadyante /
GV05brup___u:1774: atha ye śataṃ karmadevānām ānandāḥ sa eka ājānadevānām ānandaḥ /
GV05brup___u:1776: atha ye śatam ājānadevānām ānandāḥ sa ekaḥ prajāpatiloka ānandaḥ /
GV05brup___u:1778: atha ye śataṃ prajāpatiloka ānandāḥ sa eko brahmaloka ānandaḥ /
GV05brup___u:1785: atra ha yājñavalkyo bibhayāṃ cakāra -- medhāvī rājā sarvebhyo māntebhya udarautsīd iti // BrhUp_4,3.33 //
GV05brup___u:1786: sa vā eṣa etasmin svapnānte ratvā caritvā dṛṣṭvaiva puṇyaṃ ca pāpaṃ ca punaḥ pratinyāyaṃ pratiyony ādravati buddhāntāyaiva // BrhUp_4,3.34 //
GV05brup___u:1787: tad yathānaḥ susamāhitam utsarjaṃ yāyād evam evāyaṃ śārīra ātmā prājñenātmanānvārūḍha utsarjaṃ yāti /
