GV05brup___u:2228: kṣatrasya sāyujyaṃ salokatāṃ jayati ya evaṃ veda // BrhUp_5,13.4 //
GV05brup___u:2229: bhūmir antarikṣaṃ dyaur ity aṣṭāv akṣarāṇi /
GV05brup___u:2230: aṣṭākṣaraṃ ha vā ekaṃ gāyatryai padam /
GV05brup___u:2232: sa yāvad eṣu triṣu lokeṣu tāvad dha jayati yo 'syā etad evaṃ padaṃ veda // BrhUp_5,14.1 //
GV05brup___u:2234: aṣṭākṣaraṃ ha vā ekaṃ gāyatryai padam /
GV05brup___u:2236: sa yāvatīyaṃ trayī vidyā tāvad dha jayati yo 'syā etad evaṃ padaṃ veda // BrhUp_5,14.2 //
GV05brup___u:2238: aṣṭākṣaraṃ ha vā ekaṃ gāyatryai padam /
GV05brup___u:2240: sa yāvad idaṃ prāṇi tāvad dha jayati yo 'syā etad evaṃ padaṃ veda /
GV05brup___u:2241: athāsyā etad eva turīyaṃ darśataṃ padaṃ parorajā ya eṣa tapati /
GV05brup___u:2243: darśataṃ padam iti dadṛśa iva hy eṣaḥ /
GV05brup___u:2244: parorajā iti sarvam u hy evaiṣa raja upary upari tapati /
GV05brup___u:2245: evaṃ haiva śriyā yaśasā tapati yo 'syā etad evaṃ padaṃ veda // BrhUp_5,14.3 //
GV05brup___u:2246: saiṣā gāyatry etasmiṃs turīye darśate pade parorajasi pratiṣṭhitā /
GV05brup___u:2250: tasmād yad idānīṃ dvau vivadamānāv eyātam aham adarśam aham aśrauṣam iti /
GV05brup___u:2251: ya evaṃ brūyād aham adarśam iti /
GV05brup___u:2253: tad vai tat satyaṃ bale pratiṣṭhitam /
GV05brup___u:2256: tasmād āhur balaṃ satyād ogīya iti /
GV05brup___u:2257: evaṃ v eṣā gāyatry adhyātmaṃ pratiṣṭhitā /
GV05brup___u:2261: tad yad gayāṃs tatre tasmād gāyatrī nāma /
GV05brup___u:2262: sa yām evāmūṃ sāvitrīm anvāhaiṣaiva sā /
GV05brup___u:2263: sa yasmā anvāha tasya prāṇāṃs trāyate // BrhUp_5,14.4 //
GV05brup___u:2264: tāṃ haitām eke sāvitrīm anuṣṭubham anvāhuḥ /
GV05brup___u:2269: yadi ha vā apy evaṃvid bahv iva pratigṛhṇāti na haiva tad gāyatryā ekaṃ cana padaṃ prati // BrhUp_5,14.5 //
GV05brup___u:2270: sa ya imāṃs trīṃl lokān pūrṇān pratigṛhṇīyāt so 'syā etat prathamaṃ padam āpnuyāt /
GV05brup___u:2271: atha yāvatīyaṃ trayī vidyā yas tāvat pratigṛhṇīyāt so 'syā etad dvitīyaṃ padam āpnuyāt /
GV05brup___u:2272: atha yāvad idaṃ prāṇi yas tāvat pratigṛhṇīyāt so 'syā etat tṛtīyaṃ padam āpnuyāt /
GV05brup___u:2273: athāsyā etad eva turīyaṃ darśataṃ padaṃ parorajā ya eṣa tapati /
GV05brup___u:2277: gāyatry asy ekapadī dvipadī tripadī catuṣpadi /
GV05brup___u:2280: namas te turīyāya darśatāya padāya parorajase /
GV05brup___u:2282: yaṃ dviṣyād asāv asmai kāmo mā samardhīti vā /
GV05brup___u:2283: na haivāsmai sa kāmaḥ samṛdhyate yasmā evam upatiṣṭhate /
GV05brup___u:2284: aham adaḥ prāpam iti vā // BrhUp_5,14.7 //
GV05brup___u:2285: etad dha vai taj janako vaideho buḍilam āśvatarāśvim uvāca -- yan nu ho tad gāyatrīvid abrūthāḥ /
GV05brup___u:2287: mukhaṃ hy asyāḥ samrāṇ na vidāṃ cakareti hovāca /
GV05brup___u:2289: yadi ha vā api bahv ivāgnāv abhyādadhati sarvam eva tat saṃdahati /
GV05brup___u:2290: evaṃ haivaivaṃvid yady api bahv iva pāpaṃ kurute sarvam eva tat saṃpsāya śuddhaḥ pūto 'jaro 'mṛtaḥ saṃbhavati // BrhUp_5,14.8 //
GV05brup___u:2292: tat tvam pūṣann apāvṛṇu satyadharmāya dṛṣṭaye /
GV05brup___u:2293: pūṣann ekarṣe yama sūrya prājāpatya vyūha raśmīn samūha tejaḥ /
GV05brup___u:2294: yat te rūpaṃ kalyāṇatamam tat te paśyāmi yo 'sāv asau puruṣaḥ so 'ham asmi /
GV05brup___u:2295: vāyur anilam amṛtam athedaṃ bhasmāntaṃ śarīram /
GV05brup___u:2296: oṃ krato smara kṛtaṃ smara krato smara kṛtaṃ smara /
GV05brup___u:2297: agne naya supathā rāye 'smān viśvāni deva vayunāni vidvān /
GV05brup___u:2298: yuyodhy asmaj juhurāṇam eno bhūyiṣṭhāṃ te namauktiṃ vidhema // BrhUp_5,15.1 //
GV05brup___u:2299: yo ha vai jyeṣṭhaṃ ca śreṣṭhaṃ ca veda jyeṣṭhaś ca śreṣṭhaś ca svānāṃ bhavati /
GV05brup___u:2300: prāṇo vai jyeṣṭhaś ca śreṣṭhaś ca /
GV05brup___u:2301: jyeṣṭhaś ca śreṣṭhaś ca svānāṃ bhavati /
GV05brup___u:2304: yo ha vai vasiṣṭhāṃ veda vasiṣṭhaḥ svānāṃ bhavati /
GV05brup___u:2309: yo ha vai pratiṣṭhāṃ veda pratitiṣṭhati same /
GV05brup___u:2312: cakṣuṣā hi same ca durge ca pratitiṣṭhati /
GV05brup___u:2315: yo ha vai saṃpadaṃ veda saṃ hāsmai padyate yaṃ kāmaṃ kāmayate /
GV05brup___u:2318: saṃ hāsmai padyate yaṃ kāmaṃ kāmayate /
GV05brup___u:2320: yo ha vā āyatanaṃ vedāyatanaṃ svānāṃ bhavaty āyatanaṃ janānām /
GV05brup___u:2324: yo ha vai prajātiṃ veda prajāyate ha prajayā paśubhiḥ /
GV05brup___u:2328: te heme prāṇā ahaṃśreyase vivadamānā brahma jagmuḥ /
GV05brup___u:2329: tad dhocuḥ -- ko no vasiṣṭha iti /
GV05brup___u:2330: tad dhovāca -- yasmin va utkrānta idaṃ śarīraṃ pāpiyo manyate sa vo vasiṣṭha iti // BrhUp_6,1.7 //
GV05brup___u:2332: sā saṃvatsaraṃ proṣyāgatyovāca -- katham aśakata mad ṛte jīvitum iti /
GV05brup___u:2333: te hocuḥ -- yathākalā avadanto vācā prāṇantaḥ prāṇena paśyantaś cakṣuṣā śṛṇvantaḥ śrotreṇa vidvāṃso manasā prajāyamānā retasaivam ajīviṣmeti
GV05brup___u:2336: tat saṃvatsaraṃ proṣyāgatyovāca -- katham aśakata mad ṛte jīvitum iti /
GV05brup___u:2337: te hocuḥ -- yathāndhā apaśyantaś cakṣuṣā prāṇantaḥ prāṇena vadanto vācā śṛṇvantaḥ śrotreṇa vidvāṃso manasā prajāyamānā retasaivam ajīviṣmeti
GV05brup___u:2340: tat saṃvatsaraṃ proṣyāgatyovāca -- katham aśakata mad ṛte jīvitum iti /
GV05brup___u:2341: te hocuḥ -- yathā badhirā aśṛṇvantaḥ śrotreṇa prāṇantaḥ prāṇena vadanto vācā paśyantaś cakṣuṣā vidvāṃso manasā prajāyamānā retasaivam ajīviṣmeti
GV05brup___u:2344: tat saṃvatsaraṃ proṣyāgatyovāca -- katham aśakata mad ṛte jīvitum iti /
GV05brup___u:2345: te hocuḥ -- yathā mugdhā avidvāṃso manasā prāṇantaḥ prāṇena vadanto vācā paśyantaś cakṣuṣā śṛṇvantaḥ śrotreṇa prajāyamānā retasaivam ajīviṣmeti
GV05brup___u:2348: tat saṃvatsaraṃ proṣyāgatyovāca -- katham aśakata mad ṛte jīvitum iti /
GV05brup___u:2349: te hocuḥ -- yathā klībā aprajāyamānā retāsā prāṇantaḥ prāṇena vadanto vācā paśyantaś cakṣuṣā śṛṇvantaḥ śrotreṇa vidvāṃso manasaivam ajīviṣmeti
GV05brup___u:2351: atha ha prāṇa utkramiṣyan yathā mahāsuhayaḥ saindhavaḥ paḍvīśaśaṅkhūnt saṃvṛhed evaṃ haivemān prāṇānt saṃvavarha /
GV05brup___u:2353: na vai śakṣyāmas tvad ṛte jīvitum iti /
GV05brup___u:2356: sā ha vāg uvāca -- yad vā ahaṃ vasiṣṭhāsmi tvaṃ tad vasiṣṭho 'sīti /
GV05brup___u:2357: yad vā ahaṃ pratiṣṭhāsmi tvaṃ tat pratiṣṭho 'sīti cakṣuḥ /
GV05brup___u:2358: yad vā ahaṃ saṃpad asmi tvaṃ tat saṃpad asīti śrotram /
GV05brup___u:2359: yad vā aham āyatanam asmi tvaṃ tad āyatanam asīti manaḥ /
GV05brup___u:2360: yad vā ahaṃ prajātir asmi tvaṃ tat prajātir asīti retaḥ /
GV05brup___u:2361: tasyo me kim annaṃ kiṃ vāsa iti /
GV05brup___u:2362: yad idaṃ kiñcā śvabhya ā kṛmibhya ā kīṭapataṅgebhyas tat te 'nnam /
GV05brup___u:2364: na ha vā asyānannaṃ jagdhaṃ bhavati nānannaṃ pratigṛhītaṃ ya evam etad anasyānnaṃ veda /
GV05brup___u:2365: tad vidvāṃsaḥ śrotriyā aśiṣyanta ācāmanty aśitvācāmanti /
GV05brup___u:2366: etam eva tad annam anagnaṃ kurvanto manyante // BrhUp_6,1.14 //
GV05brup___u:2367: śvetaketur vā āruṇeyaḥ pancālānāṃ pariṣadam ājagāma /
GV05brup___u:2373: vettha yathemāḥ prajāḥ prayatyo vipratipadyantā3 iti /
GV05brup___u:2375: vettho yathemaṃ lokaṃ punar āpadyantā3 iti /
GV05brup___u:2377: vettho yathāsau loka evaṃ bahubhiḥ punaḥ punaḥ prayadbhir na saṃpūryatā3 iti /
GV05brup___u:2379: vettho yatithyām āhutyāṃ hutāyām āpaḥ puruṣavāco bhūtvā samutthāya vadantī3 iti /
GV05brup___u:2381: vettho devayānasya vā pathaḥ pratipadaṃ pitṛyāṇasya vā /
GV05brup___u:2382: yat kṛtvā devayānaṃ vā panthānaṃ pratipadyante pitṛyāṇaṃ vā /
GV05brup___u:2383: api hi na ṛṣer vacaḥ śrutaṃ --
GV05brup___u:2384: dve sṛtī aśṛṇavaṃ pitṝṇām ahaṃ devānām uta martyānām /
GV05brup___u:2385: tābhyām idaṃ viśvam ejat sameti yad antarā pitaraṃ mātaraṃ ceti /
GV05brup___u:2386: nāham ata ekaṃ cana vedeti hovāca // BrhUp_6,2.2 //
GV05brup___u:2390: taṃ hovāca -- iti vāva kila no bhavān purānuśiṣṭān avoca iti /
GV05brup___u:2395: ima iti ha pratīkāny udājahāra // BrhUp_6,2.3 //
GV05brup___u:2396: sa hovāca -- tathā nas tvaṃ tata jānīthā yathā yad ahaṃ kiṃca veda sarvam ahaṃ tat tubham avocam /
GV05brup___u:2400: sa ājagāma gautamo yatra pravāhaṇasya jaivaler āsa /
GV05brup___u:2403: taṃ hovāca -- varaṃ bhagavate gautamāya dadma iti // BrhUp_6,2.4 //
GV05brup___u:2404: sa hovāca -- pratijñato ma eṣa varaḥ /
GV05brup___u:2405: yāṃ tu kumārasyānte vācam abhāṣathās tāṃ me brūhīti // BrhUp_6,2.5 //
GV05brup___u:2406: sa hovāca -- daiveṣu vai gautama tad vareṣu /
GV05brup___u:2408: sa hovāca -- vijñāyate hāstihiraṇyasyāpāttaṃ goaśvānāṃ dāsīnāṃ pravārāṇāṃ paridhānasya /
GV05brup___u:2409: mā no bhavān bahor anantasyāparyantasyābhyavadānyo bhūd iti /
GV05brup___u:2414: sa hovāca -- tathā nas tvam gautama māparādhās tava ca pitāmahāḥ /
GV05brup___u:2415: yatheyaṃ vidyetaḥ pūrvaṃ na kasmiṃś cana brāhmana uvāsa /
GV05brup___u:2417: ko hi tvaivaṃ bruvantam arhati pratyākhyātum iti // BrhUp_6,2.8 //
GV05brup___u:2424: tasminn etasminn agnau devāḥ śraddhāṃ juhvati /
GV05brup___u:2425: tasyā āhutyai somo rājā saṃbhavati // BrhUp_6,2.9 //
GV05brup___u:2432: tasminn etasminn agnau devāḥ somaṃ rājānaṃ juhvati /
GV05brup___u:2440: tasminn etasminn agnau devā vṛṣṭiṃ juhvati /
GV05brup___u:2448: tasminn etasminn agnau devā annaṃ juhvati /
GV05brup___u:2456: tasminn etasminn agnau devā reto juhvati /
GV05brup___u:2467: tasminn etasminn agnau devāḥ puruṣaṃ juhvati /
GV05brup___u:2468: tasyā āhutyai puruṣo bhāsvaravarṇaḥ saṃbhavati // BrhUp_6,2.14 //
GV05brup___u:2469: te ya evam etad vidur ye cāmī araṇye śraddhāṃ satyam upāsate te 'rcir abhisaṃbhavanti /
GV05brup___u:2472: āpūryamāṇapakṣād yān ṣaṇ māsān udaṅṅ āditya eti /
GV05brup___u:2476: tān vaidyutān puruṣo mānasa etya brahmalokān gamayati /
GV05brup___u:2477: te teṣu brahmalokeṣu parāḥ parāvato vasanti /
GV05brup___u:2479: atha ye yajñena dānena tapasā lokāñ jayanti te dhūmam abhisaṃbhavanti /
GV05brup___u:2482: apakṣīyamāṇapakṣād yān ṣaṇ māsān dakṣiṇāditya eti /
GV05brup___u:2486: tāṃs tatra devā yathā somaṃ rājānam āpyāyasvāpakṣīyasvety evam enāṃs tatra bhakṣayanti /
GV05brup___u:2487: teṣāṃ yadā tat paryavaity athemam evākāśam abhiniṣpadyante /
GV05brup___u:2492: te punaḥ puruṣāgnau hūyante tato yoṣāgnau jāyante /
GV05brup___u:2494: atha ya etau panthānau na vidus te kīṭāḥ pataṅgā yad idaṃ dandaśūkam // BrhUp_6,2.16 //
GV05brup___u:2495: sa yaḥ kāmayeta -- mahat prāpnuyām ity udagayana āpūryamāṇapakṣasya puṇyāhe dvādaśāham
GV05brup___u:2496: upasadvratī bhūtvaudumbare kaṃse camase vā sarvauṣadhaṃ phalānīti saṃbhṛtya parisamuhya
GV05brup___u:2497: parilipyāgnim upasamādhāya paristīryāvṛtājyaṃ saṃskṛtya puṃsā nakṣatreṇa manthaṃ saṃnīya juhoti --
GV05brup___u:2498: yāvanto devās tvayi jātavedas tiryañco ghnanti puruṣasya kāmān /
GV05brup___u:2499: tebhyo 'haṃ bhāgadheyaṃ juhomi te mā tṛptāḥ sarvaiḥ kāmais tarpayantu svāhā /
GV05brup___u:2501: tāṃ tvā ghṛtasya dhārayā yaje saṃrādhanīm ahaṃ svāhā // BrhUp_6,3.1 //
GV05brup___u:2502: jyeṣṭhāya svāhā śreṣṭhāya svāhety agnau hutvā manthe saṃsravam avanayati /
GV05brup___u:2503: prāṇāya svāhā vasiṣṭhāyai svāhety agnau hutvā manthe saṃsravam avanayati /
GV05brup___u:2504: vāce svāhā pratiṣṭhāyai svāhety agnau hutvā manthe saṃsravam avanayati /
GV05brup___u:2505: cakṣuṣe svāhā saṃpade svāhety agnau hutvā manthe saṃsravam avanayati /
GV05brup___u:2506: śrotrāya svāhāyatanāya svāhety agnau hutvā manthe saṃsravam avanayati /
GV05brup___u:2507: manase svāhā prajātyai svāhety agnau hutvā manthe saṃsravam avanayati /
GV05brup___u:2508: retase svāhety agnau hutvā manthe saṃsravam avanayati // BrhUp_6,3.2 //
GV05brup___u:2509: agnaye svāhety agnau hutvā manthe saṃsravam avanayati /
GV05brup___u:2510: somāya svāhety agnau hutvā manthe saṃsravam avanayati /
GV05brup___u:2511: bhūḥ svāhety agnau hutvā manthe saṃsravam avanayati /
GV05brup___u:2512: bhuvaḥ svāhety agnau hutvā manthe saṃsravam avanayati /
GV05brup___u:2513: svaḥ svāhety agnau hutvā manthe saṃsravam avanayati /
GV05brup___u:2514: bhūr bhuvaḥ svaḥ svāhety agnau hutvā manthe saṃsravam avanayati /
GV05brup___u:2515: brahmaṇe svāhety agnau hutvā manthe saṃsravam avanayati /
GV05brup___u:2516: kṣatrāya svāhety agnau hutvā manthe saṃsravam avanayati /
GV05brup___u:2517: bhūtāya svāhety agnau hutvā manthe saṃsravam avanayati /
GV05brup___u:2518: bhaviṣyate svāhety agnau hutvā manthe saṃsravam avanayati /
GV05brup___u:2519: viśvāya svāhety agnau hutvā manthe saṃsravam avanayati /
GV05brup___u:2520: sarvāya svāhety agnau hutvā manthe saṃsravam avanayati /
GV05brup___u:2521: prajāpataye svāhety agnau hutvā manthe saṃsravam avanayati // BrhUp_6,3.3 //
GV05brup___u:2540: athainam udyacchaty āmaṃsy āmaṃ hi te mahi /
GV05brup___u:2542: sa māṃ rājeśano 'dhipatiṃ karotv iti // BrhUp_6,3.5 //
GV05brup___u:2545: madhu vātā ṛtāyate madhu kṣaranti sindhavaḥ /
GV05brup___u:2549: madhu naktam utoṣaso madhumat pārthivaṃ rajaḥ /
GV05brup___u:2553: madhumān no vanaspatir madhumāṃ astu sūryaḥ /
GV05brup___u:2557: sarvāś ca madhumatīr aham evedaṃ sarvaṃ bhūyāsaṃ bhūr bhuvaḥ svaḥ svāheti antata ācamya pāṇī prakṣālya jaghanenāgniṃ prākśirāḥ saṃviśati /
GV05brup___u:2561: yathetam etya jaghanenāgnim āsīno vaṃśaṃ japati // BrhUp_6,3.6 //
GV05brup___u:2562: taṃ haitam uddālaka āruṇir vājasaneyāya yājñavalkyāyāntevāsina uktvovāca -- api ya enaṃ śuṣke sthāṇau niṣiñcej jāyerañ chākhāḥ praroheyuḥ palāśānīti
GV05brup___u:2563: etam u haiva vājasaneyo yājnavalkyo madhukāya paiṅgyāyāntevāsina uktvovāca -- api ya enaṃ śuṣke sthāṇau niṣiñcej jāyerañ chākhāḥ praroheyuḥ palāśānīti // BrhUp_6,3.8 //
GV05brup___u:2564: etam u haiva madhukaḥ paiṅgyaś cūlāya bhāgavittaye 'ntevāsina uktvovāca -- api ya enaṃ śuṣke sthāṇau niṣiñcej jāyerañ chākhāḥ praroheyuḥ palāśānīti
GV05brup___u:2565: etam u haiva cūlo bhāgavittir jānakaya āyaḥsthūṇāyāntevāsina uktvovāca -- api ya enaṃ śuṣke sthāṇau niṣiñcej jāyerañ chākhāḥ praroheyuḥ palāśānīti
GV05brup___u:2566: etam u haiva jānakir āyasthūṇaḥ satyakāmāya jābālāyāntevāsina uktvovāca -- api ya enaṃ śuṣke sthāṇau niṣiñcej jāyerañ chākhāḥ praroheyuḥ palāśānīti
GV05brup___u:2567: etam u haiva satyakāmo jābālo 'ntevāsibhya uktvova -- acāpi ya enaṃ śuṣke sthāṇau niṣiñcej jāyerañ chākhāḥ praroheyuḥ palāśānīti /
GV05brup___u:2568: tam etaṃ nāputrāya vānantevāsine vā brūyāt // BrhUp_6,3.12 //
GV05brup___u:2570: audumbaraḥ sruva audumbaraś camasa audumbara idhma audumbaryā upamanthanyau /
GV05brup___u:2572: vrīhiyavās tilamāṣā aṇupriyaṃgavo godhūmāś ca masūrāś ca khalvāś ca khalakulāś ca /
GV05brup___u:2573: tān piṣṭān dadhani madhuni ghṛta upasiñcati /
GV05brup___u:2582: sa ha prajāpatir īkṣāṃ cakre -- hantāsmai pratiṣṭhāṃ kalpayānīti sa striyaṃ sasṛje /
GV05brup___u:2585: sa etaṃ prāñcaṃ grāvāṇam ātmana eva samudapārayat /
GV05brup___u:2591: sa yāvān ha vai vājapeyena yajamanasya loko bhavati tāvān asya loko bhavati /
GV05brup___u:2592: ya evaṃ vidvān adhopahāsaṃ caraty āsāṃ strīṇāṃ sukṛtaṃ vṛṅkte /
GV05brup___u:2593: atha ya idam avidvān adhopahāsaṃ caraty āsya striyaḥ sukṛtaṃ vṛñjate // BrhUp_6,4.3 //
GV05brup___u:2594: etad dha sma vai tad vidvān uddālaka ārunir āha /
GV05brup___u:2595: etad dha sma vai tad vidvān nāko maudgalya āha /
GV05brup___u:2596: etad dha sma vai tad vidvān kumārahārita āha -- bahavo maryā brāhmanāyanā nirindriyā visukṛto 'smāl lokāt prayanti ya idam avidvāṃso 'dhopahāsaṃ carantīti /
GV05brup___u:2597: bahu vā idaṃ suptasya vā jāgrato vā retaḥ skandati // BrhUp_6,4.4 //
GV05brup___u:2598: tad abhimṛśed anu vā mantrayeta -- yan me 'dya retaḥ pṛthivīm askāntsīd yad oṣadhīr apy asarad yad apaḥ /
GV05brup___u:2600: punar mām aitu indriyaṃ punas tejaḥ punar bhagaḥ /
GV05brup___u:2602: ity anāmikāṅguṣṭhābhyām ādāyāntareṇa stanau vā bhruvau vā nimṛjyāt // BrhUp_6,4.5 //
GV05brup___u:2603: atha yady udaka ātmānaṃ paśyet tad abhimantrayeta -- mayi teja indriyaṃ yaśo draviṇaṃ sukṛtam iti /
GV05brup___u:2604: śrīr ha vā eṣā strīṇāṃ yan malodvāsāḥ /
GV05brup___u:2606: sā ced asmai na dadyāt kāmam enām avakriṇīyāt /
GV05brup___u:2607: sā ced asmai naiva dadyāt kāmam enāṃ yaṣṭyā vā pāṇinā vopahatyātikrāmet /
GV05brup___u:2608: indriyena te yaśasā yaśa ādada iti /
GV05brup___u:2610: sā ced asmai dadyād indriyeṇa te yaśasā yaśa ādadhāmīti /
GV05brup___u:2612: sa yām icchet -- kāmayeta meti tasyām arthaṃ niṣṭhāya mukhena mukhaṃ saṃdhāyopastham asyā abhimṛśya japet --
GV05brup___u:2614: sa tvam aṅgakaṣāyo 'si digdhaviddhām iva mādayemām amūṃ mayīti // BrhUp_6,4.9 //
GV05brup___u:2615: atha yām icchen na garbhaṃ dadhīteti tasyām arthaṃ niṣṭhāya mukhena mukhaṃ saṃdhāyābhiprāṇyāpānyāt /
GV05brup___u:2616: indriyeṇa te retasā reta ādada iti /
GV05brup___u:2618: atha yām icched dadhīteti tasyām arthaṃ niṣṭhāya mukhena mukhaṃ saṃdhāyāpānyābhiprāṇyāt /
GV05brup___u:2621: atha yasya jāyāyai jāraḥ syāt taṃ ced dviṣyād āmapātre 'gnim upasamādhāya pratilomaṃ śarabarhiḥ stīrtvā tasminn etāḥ śarabhṛṣṭīḥ pratilomāḥ sarpiṣāktā juhuyāt /
GV05brup___u:2630: sa vā eṣa nirindriyo visukṛto 'smāl lokād praiti yam evaṃvid brāhmaṇaḥ śapati /
GV05brup___u:2632: uta hy evaṃvit paro bhavati // BrhUp_6,4.12 //
GV05brup___u:2633: atha yasya jāyām ārtavaṃ vindet tryahaṃ kaṃse na pibet /
GV05brup___u:2637: sa ya icchet -- putro me śuklo jāyeta vedam anubruvīta sarvam āyur iyād iti kṣīraudanaṃ pācayitvā sarpiṣmantam aśnīyātām /
GV05brup___u:2639: atha ya icchet -- putro me kapilaḥ piṅgalo jāyeta dvau vedāv anubruvīta sarvam āyur iyād iti dadhyodanaṃ pācayitvā sarpiṣmantam aśnīyātām /
GV05brup___u:2641: atha ya icchet -- putro me śyāmo lohitākṣo jāyeta trīn vedān anubruvīta sarvam āyur iyād iti udaudanaṃ pācayitvā sarpiṣmantam aśnīyātām /
GV05brup___u:2643: atha ya icched -- duhitā me paṇḍitā jāyeta sarvam āyur iyād iti tilaudanaṃ pācayitvā sarpiṣmantam aśnīyātām /
GV05brup___u:2645: atha ya icchet -- putro me paṇḍito vigītaḥ samitiṃgamaḥ śuśrūṣitāṃ vācaṃ bhāṣitā jāyeta sarvān vedān anubruvīta sarvam āyur iyād iti māṃsaudanaṃ pācayitvā sarpiṣmantam aśnīyātām /
GV05brup___u:2648: athābhiprātar eva sthālīpākāvṛtājyaṃ ceṣṭitvā sthālīpākasyopaghātaṃ juhoty agnaye svāhānumataye svāhā devāya savitre satyaprasavāya svāheti
GV05brup___u:2651: prakṣālya pāṇī udapātraṃ pūrayitvā tenaināṃ trir abhyukṣati --
GV05brup___u:2654: athainām abhipadyate -- amo 'ham asmi sā tvam /
GV05brup___u:2658: tāv ehi saṃrabhāvahai saha reto dadhāvahai /
GV05brup___u:2660: athāsyā ūrū vihāpayati -- vijihīthāṃ dyāvāpṛthivī iti /
GV05brup___u:2661: tasyām arthaṃ niṣṭhāya mukhena mukhaṃ saṃdhāya trir enām anulomām anumārṣṭi --
GV05brup___u:2662: viṣṇur yoniṃ kalpayatu tvaṣṭā rūpāṇi piṃśatu /
GV05brup___u:2663: ā siñcatu prajāpatir dhātā garbhaṃ dadhātu te /
GV05brup___u:2664: garbhaṃ dhehi sinīvāli garbhaṃ dhehi pṛthuṣṭuke /
GV05brup___u:2665: garbhaṃ te aśvinau devāv ādhattāṃ puṣkarasrajau // BrhUp_6,4.21 //
GV05brup___u:2667: taṃ te garbhaṃ havāmahe daśame māsi sūtaye /
GV05brup___u:2668: yathāgnigarbhā pṛthivī yathā dyaur aindreṇa garbhiṇī /
GV05brup___u:2669: vāyur diśāṃ yathā garbha evaṃ garbhaṃ dadhāmi te 'sāv iti // BrhUp_6,4.22 //
GV05brup___u:2672: evā te garbha ejatu sahāvaitu jarāyuṇā /
GV05brup___u:2674: tam indra nirjahi garbheṇa sāvarāṃ saheti // BrhUp_6,4.23 //
GV05brup___u:2675: jāte 'gnim upasamādhāyāṅka ādhāya kaṃse pṛṣadājyaṃ saṃnīya pṛṣadājyasyopaghātaṃ juhoti --
GV05brup___u:2677: asyopasandyāṃ mā chaitsīt prajayā ca paśubhiś ca svāhā /
GV05brup___u:2678: mayi prāṇāṃs tvayi manasā juhomi svāhā /
GV05brup___u:2679: yat karmaṇātyarīricam yad vā nyūnam ihākaram /
GV05brup___u:2680: agniṣṭat sviṣṭakṛd vidvān sviṣṭaṃ suhutaṃ karotu naḥ svāheti // BrhUp_6,4.24 //
GV05brup___u:2681: athāsya dakṣiṇaṃ karṇam abhinidhāya vāg vāg iti triḥ /
GV05brup___u:2682: atha dadhi madhu ghṛtaṃ saṃnīyānantarhitena jātarūpeṇa prāśayati /
GV05brup___u:2683: bhūs te dadhāmi bhuvas te dadhāmi svas te dadhāmi bhūr bhuvaḥ svaḥ sarvaṃ tvayi dadhāmīti // BrhUp_6,4.25 //
GV05brup___u:2685: tad asyaitad guhyam eva nāma bhavati // BrhUp_6,4.26 //
GV05brup___u:2686: athainaṃ mātre pradāya stanaṃ prayacchati -- yas te stanaḥ śaśayo yo mayobhūr yo ratnadhā vasuvid yaḥ sudatraḥ /
GV05brup___u:2687: yena viśvā puṣyasi vāryāṇi sarasvati tam iha dhātave kar iti // BrhUp_6,4.27 //
GV05brup___u:2688: athāsya mātaram abhimantrayate -- ilāsi maitrāvaruṇī vīre vīram ajījanat /
GV05brup___u:2689: sā tvaṃ vīravatī bhava yāsmān vīravato 'karad iti /
GV05brup___u:2690: taṃ vā etam āhuḥ -- atipitā batābhūḥ /
GV05brup___u:2692: paramāṃ bata kāṣṭhāṃ prāpa śriyā yaśasā brahmavarcasena /
GV05brup___u:2693: ya evaṃvido brāhmaṇasya putro jāyata iti // BrhUp_6,4.28 //
GV05brup___u:2748: ādityānīmāni śuklāni yajūṃṣi vājasaneyena yājñavalkyenākhyayante // BrhUp_6,5.3 //
